name: Nicholas Mole
text: I have eaten at other locations but recently visited this location for my weekly cheat meal. And of course the food was what I expected but the tall black guy who takes the to go orders and the new manager that started 5 months ago are fantastic. We ran into a little opportunity and they handled it with seemless effort. You can tell they both enjoy what they do and show it with their customer interactions. I called everyone I knew that day to tell them about my experience. Keep up the great work guys!!

name: Anthony Roberts
text: On the higher end of price for pizza, but they have so many different types you can't get anywhere else. I highly recommended you try it at least once.

name: Sherie Chestnut
text: We will not make this mistake again. Extremely extremely overpriced for middling food, mediocre service, and a cramped setting. We realized how terrible this was long before receiving out nearly $200 dollar bill. Most likely somewhere between being told that the Lobster Bisque on the the menu was unavailable when there are so few options), and waiting 10 minutes for a glass of water. Terrible

name: Jonathan Robert
text: Food was ok, felt like the atmosphere as well as service was a little TOO casual.  Probably had something to do with our table being transferred between servers right after the appetizers.

name: David Bishop
text:
A friend Sally took me here for my first time service was awesome ( ask for Randy he was the greatest)
Started with a humus app
chicken pesto pizza excellent
Loved it thanks Sally

name: Kevin Woody
text: Great service, great manager, great food!!

name: Brian Harvey
text: Good food, service so so

name: Arnie Reed
text: Enjoyed the caramelized peach salad with chicken.

name: Krishun Hudson
text: The staff and manager are always very friendly and keeps a smile on their faces. Always feel welcome everytime. Also, the food is always made with fresh ingredients and always on time. If anyone does have a problem, they take care of and your issues with no hesitation. The Pizza Hut in Montevallo Al is absolutely the best. We love our Hut!!!

name: Otis Geystan
text: I try my best to give Pizza Hut my service but every time there is a problem. My food showed up cold because as the driver said “Someone didn’t put the wings in the bag with the pizza, so he had to go back to the store to get them”. After waiting almost two hours I called just to be told “there’s no orders on the table it should be on the way”. Still didn’t get everything I paid for. The only reason they got one star is because the delivery driver was cool even though he had to deliver in the rain. The Pizza Hut in Montevallo needs new management. I know it was the manager that answered the phone and customer service isn’t for her.

name: Christian Buckner
text: No masks, requested curbside and waited 10 min before going inside as no employees were looking outside. Not busy. Food was great.

name: Courtney Baugh
text: I have attempted to give this location so many chances. Literally the worst Pizza Hut I have used. This last time I ordered delivery and got a call that their delivery guy didn’t show and it would be 3 before they had a driver. Mind you this whole call the lady was so rude about the situation. I load up the kids to go pick up my order I walk in she doesn’t even ask who I am just grabs $3 from the drawer and hands me pizza. Again I never even told her my name so I could have been anyone. And then I witnessed her being extremely rude to an elderly gentleman that was ordering. After the man order he kindly let her know that they were going to sit in the car and she shrugs her shoulders and says AND I DONT CARE. Also the pizza had a weird aftertaste that tasted like alcohol.

name: Jazzy L
text: The staff is rude especially the people who work on the phones. My pizza and pasta is always dry carry out or delivery. They don’t have their curbside pickup sign up. -12/10 on customer service. -50/100 for food quality.

name: Kristy Edwards
text: I did curb side pick up. I called when I got there and they told me it would be two minutes. I waited 15 minutes before trying to call again. No one answered so I got out and went in and my food had been sitting in the warmer the whole time. This store is understaffed. The food was delicious but the service was bad.

name: Dericc Williams
text: Bad attitudes rude and the owner must not care about their store ...how do you order extra cheese and get more cheese without asking for extra..when you have people working jst too get a check and don't understand that if your costumers are not happy you don't get a check and your store closes like the others

name: Courtney Sparks
text: So all of my food was great, but i ordered bread sticks with an extra marinara. Both marinara cups were barely filled, i poured both of them together and didnt even have half the container filled. Other than that the food was good and the customer service was great. Just feel like i shouldnt of had to pay for an extra sauce that literally had a tablespoons worth in the cup.

name: Dericc Williams
text: Bad attitudes rude and the owner must not care about their store ...how do you order extra cheese and get more cheese without asking for extra..when you have people working jst too get a check and don't understand that if your costumers are not happy you don't get a check and your store closes like the others

text: This location does an awesome job!  The delivery driver was nice and the pizza was great.

name: Courtney Sparks
text: So all of my food was great, but i ordered bread sticks with an extra marinara. name: Squeakyyr 4 Brown
text: None of the employees wore gloves or mask...

name: Erick Shields
text: Great atmosphere and very affable service. The meals were crisp and yummy. Will definitely recommend this place to friends and family. Affordable prices and large portions. Great job.

name: Harold Hickman
text: This place is worth giving a shot. They have big portions for convenient rates. Always clean and with fantastic character. Will visit here again.

name: Shawn Romanstine
text: Ordered online 2 medium speciality and recv 1 cheese and 1 sausage but was charged for speciality. The person working said I got what I ordered. Ok but why did I pay for what I didn't get? The 2nd time in a row my order was wrong!!! Now to the top!

name: Kolton Buck
text: I simply like their food. I always get great customer service there. The place is clean and the staff members are always helpful. I highly recommend this place.

name: Brenda Brown
text: Best pizza I've had in a long time

name: keepcoolalive
text: Pretty sure I’ve gotten sick the last two times I’ve eaten here. Completely strengthened my fear of getting food from anywhere other than MY kitchen.

name: sonido pachuko king
text: Terrible service, they don't know how to place an order and rude manager has NO professionalism

name: Zac Copeland
text: Can't ever get instructions right, such as a regular Dr.Pepper not a Diet, can't seem to remember to put the garlic crust flavor on a stuffed crust pizza, brought a sierra mist the other day when asked for Mt. Dew. Its the simple things really.

name: Stephanie Thacker
text: Absurd service! Waited over an hour AFTER the pizza was out for delivery. They forgot our drink. When we called, the manager was rude and wouldn’t contact the delivery driver to bring one. So we asked just to be credited the couple dollars for it. They charged my card without asking an extra $10 because it “changed the special” without the drink that THEY forgot. So I paid $49 for 2 cold pizzas. I’ll stick to papa Johns from now on.

name: s8vy15
text: Went in earlier today and placed an order for our youth football team. We ordered 6 pizzas and stressed they needed to be delievered there at a certain time and was told they would be. Called for 15 minutes to FINALLY have the actual store answer to tell us our order was still sitting in the store at the time they were SUPPOSED to be delivered and waiting on a driver. Really this was PRE ORDERED!!!  This is ridiculous the way their service is.

name: Randy Hatcher
text: Ordered pizza got home only half toppings on it plus IT WAS burnt so bad it was black no sauce on it at all call up there talked to TOM the manager and was told I have to drive back 15 mins 1 way to fix there problem and the guy told me oh well it is what it is. Ya never again will i do business with them.

name: Deanna Davenport
text: Terrible service. Ordered a simple pizza over the phone, got to business after 30 mins and they had my number saved and NO pizza. Had to "reorder" and still tried to charge full price with no apologies of the long wait!

name: Michael Patton
text:
Mobile app wouldn't let me cancel a double-clicked order which would have cost 10.90.  Called and they got light sauce confused with extra sauce.  The cost was 12.46.  Got home to a pizza I didn't eat but two bites of.

I won't ever order via phone again.  Hope the app works better someday.

name: Corey Baginski
text:
Had been ordering delivery from here for quite a while. Called in my order tonight and was told they didn't have any delivery drivers. On a Saturday night. There must be something wrong with either what they pay, or whoever answered the phone didn't give a $#!+.
Please remove the delivery option from your website.
Thank you, Domino's, for delivering.

name: Joey Icolano
text: Love the new location!  Fast friendly service.  Great value from the $5 Flavor Menu

name: Whit Russell
text: This place is been doing very good pizza in town for a very long time. They moved to a new location a couple of years ago, but it's the same franchise.

name: Robin Simmons
text: I enjoyed the convenience of ordering online. Pizza hut in Montevallo did a wonderful job. The service was great and the food was delicious!

name: R B
text: Ordered three pizzas, all three were over cooked, all three pizzas were not cut all the way through and very difficult to cut. I had my elderly father pick up the pizza due me being ill and needing to feed the kids. My dad didn’t look at the pizza or didn’t realize how over cooked it was and he had no way of knowing about the pizzas not being cut through. Regardless it should have not been served to customers. I called to address the issue the manger did not apologize once, in fact he sounded like he didn’t care at all. He just offered a credit for one pizza. I was suppose to have a credit from their last mess up, but didn’t push it and wanted to give them another try when placing the order. Whoever is in charge at the moment is doing a terrible job.

name: Mustang Concepts
text:
Worst EVER!!! Ordered pizza, waited 101 minutes for said pizza to arrive. Needless to say the pies  resembled cardboard wheels with cheese. As for the bread sticks, well they would have served a better purpose as rubber chew toys for the pooch!! I called the store and waited 27 minutes to speak to a manager, only to have the phone hung up by some over achieving pizza clerk who didn't even bother to check if someone was on the line. HELLOOOOOOO!!!!!!!.
YOU CANT FIX STUPID and for a college town, there sure are a LOT of IGNORANT people here!!!

name: Kathy Hughes
text: Pizza is soggy. Has large chunks of green peppers.The cinnamon bread is good and the delivery drive was nice.

name: Taylor Coe
text: Terrible. Used to work there and it’s only gone downhill. Had a two and a half hour wait for just wings and fries. Would have picked it up but the woman on the phone claimed my number didn’t work. I don’t even like the pizza, but the wings are much better than Dominoes.

name: Dinki Wheeler
text: Good service hot food just the calzones had barely any meat or cheese

name: Mary Bullard
text: Tonight was awful. Ordered a BBQ beef pizza and got delivered a pizza with bbq sauce an cheese. Called back up there an was put on hold because they were cleaning up. So.i pulled up at 9:58 an they were supposed to close at 10.. sorry but yall bout to make me the correct pizza. The manager Tracy was very rude she was from the prattville pizza hut.

text: We will not make this mistake again. Extremely extremely overpriced for middling food, mediocre service, and a cramped setting. We realized how terrible this was long before receiving out nearly $200 dollar bill. Most likely somewhere between being told that the Lobster Bisque on the the menu was unavailable when there are so few options), and waiting 10 minutes for a glass of water. Terrible

name: Jonathan Robert
text: Food was ok, felt like the atmosphere as well as service was a little TOO casual.  Probably had something to do with our table being transferred between servers right after the appetizers.

name: David Bishop
text:
A friend Sally took me here for my first time service was awesome ( ask for Randy he was the greatest)
Started with a humus app
chicken pesto pizza excellent
Loved it thanks Sally

name: Kevin Woody
text: Great service, great manager, great food!!

name: Brian Harvey
text: Good food, service so so

name: Arnie Reed
text: Enjoyed the caramelized peach salad with chicken.

name: Ashley Maddox
text: Love it

name: West Martin
text: Yum

name: Krishun Hudson
text: The staff and manager are always very friendly and keeps a smile on their faces. Always feel welcome everytime. Also, the food is always made with fresh ingredients and always on time. If anyone does have a problem, they take care of and your issues with no hesitation. The Pizza Hut in Montevallo Al is absolutely the best. We love our Hut!!!

name: Otis Geystan
text: I try my best to give Pizza Hut my service but every time there is a problem. My food showed up cold because as the driver said “Someone didn’t put the wings in the bag with the pizza, so he had to go back to the store to get them”. After waiting almost two hours I called just to be told “there’s no orders on the table it should be on the way”. Still didn’t get everything I paid for. The only reason they got one star is because the delivery driver was cool even though he had to deliver in the rain. The Pizza Hut in Montevallo needs new management. I know it was the manager that answered the phone and customer service isn’t for her.

name: Christian Buckner
text: No masks, requested curbside and waited 10 min before going inside as no employees were looking outside. Not busy. Food was great.

name: Courtney Baugh
text: I have attempted to give this location so many chances. Literally the worst Pizza Hut I have used. This last time I ordered delivery and got a call that their delivery guy didn’t show and it would be 3 before they had a driver. Mind you this whole call the lady was so rude about the situation. I load up the kids to go pick up my order I walk in she doesn’t even ask who I am just grabs $3 from the drawer and hands me pizza. Again I never even told her my name so I could have been anyone. And then I witnessed her being extremely rude to an elderly gentleman that was ordering. After the man order he kindly let her know that they were going to sit in the car and she shrugs her shoulders and says AND I DONT CARE. Also the pizza had a weird aftertaste that tasted like alcohol.

name: Jazzy L
text: The staff is rude especially the people who work on the phones. My pizza and pasta is always dry carry out or delivery. They don’t have their curbside pickup sign up. -12/10 on customer service. -50/100 for food quality.

name: Kristy Edwards
text: I did curb side pick up. I called when I got there and they told me it would be two minutes. I waited 15 minutes before trying to call again. No one answered so I got out and went in and my food had been sitting in the warmer the whole time. This store is understaffed. The food was delicious but the service was bad.

name: Dericc Williams
text: Bad attitudes rude and the owner must not care about their store ...how do you order extra cheese and get more cheese without asking for extra..when you have people working jst too get a check and don't understand that if your costumers are not happy you don't get a check and your store closes like the others

name: Courtney Sparks
text: So all of my food was great, but i ordered bread sticks with an extra marinara. Both marinara cups were barely filled, i poured both of them together and didnt even have half the container filled. Other than that the food was good and the customer service was great. Just feel like i shouldnt of had to pay for an extra sauce that literally had a tablespoons worth in the cup.

name: Squeakyyr 4 Brown
text: None of the employees wore gloves or mask...

name: Erick Shields
text: Great atmosphere and very affable service. The meals were crisp and yummy. Will definitely recommend this place to friends and family. Affordable prices and large portions. Great job.

name: Harold Hickman
text: This place is worth giving a shot. They have big portions for convenient rates. Always clean and with fantastic character. Will visit here again.

name: Shawn Romanstine
text: Ordered online 2 medium speciality and recv 1 cheese and 1 sausage but was charged for speciality. The person working said I got what I ordered. Ok but why did I pay for what I didn't get? The 2nd time in a row my order was wrong!!! Now to the top!

name: Kolton Buck
text: I simply like their food. I always get great customer service there. The place is clean and the staff members are always helpful. I highly recommend this place.

name: Brenda Brown
text: Best pizza I've had in a long time

name: keepcoolalive
text: Pretty sure I’ve gotten sick the last two times I’ve eaten here. Completely strengthened my fear of getting food from anywhere other than MY kitchen.

name: sonido pachuko king
text: Terrible service, they don't know how to place an order and rude manager has NO professionalism

name: Zac Copeland
text: Can't ever get instructions right, such as a regular Dr.Pepper not a Diet, can't seem to remember to put the garlic crust flavor on a stuffed crust pizza, brought a sierra mist the other day when asked for Mt. Dew. Its the simple things really.

name: Stephanie Thacker
text: Absurd service! Waited over an hour AFTER the pizza was out for delivery. They forgot our drink. When we called, the manager was rude and wouldn’t contact the delivery driver to bring one. So we asked just to be credited the couple dollars for it. They charged my card without asking an extra $10 because it “changed the special” without the drink that THEY forgot. So I paid $49 for 2 cold pizzas. I’ll stick to papa Johns from now on.

name: s8vy15
text: Went in earlier today and placed an order for our youth football team. We ordered 6 pizzas and stressed they needed to be delievered there at a certain time and was told they would be. Called for 15 minutes to FINALLY have the actual store answer to tell us our order was still sitting in the store at the time they were SUPPOSED to be delivered and waiting on a driver. Really this was PRE ORDERED!!!  This is ridiculous the way their service is.

name: Randy Hatcher
text: Ordered pizza got home only half toppings on it plus IT WAS burnt so bad it was black no sauce on it at all call up there talked to TOM the manager and was told I have to drive back 15 mins 1 way to fix there problem and the guy told me oh well it is what it is. Ya never again will i do business with them.

name: Deanna Davenport
text: Terrible service. Ordered a simple pizza over the phone, got to business after 30 mins and they had my number saved and NO pizza. Had to "reorder" and still tried to charge full price with no apologies of the long wait!

name: Michael Patton
text:
Mobile app wouldn't let me cancel a double-clicked order which would have cost 10.90.  Called and they got light sauce confused with extra sauce.  The cost was 12.46.  Got home to a pizza I didn't eat but two bites of.

I won't ever order via phone again.  Hope the app works better someday.

name: Corey Baginski
text:
Had been ordering delivery from here for quite a while. Called in my order tonight and was told they didn't have any delivery drivers. On a Saturday night. There must be something wrong with either what they pay, or whoever answered the phone didn't give a $#!+.
Please remove the delivery option from your website.
Thank you, Domino's, for delivering.

name: Joey Icolano
text: Love the new location!  Fast friendly service.  Great value from the $5 Flavor Menu

name: Whit Russell
text: This place is been doing very good pizza in town for a very long time. They moved to a new location a couple of years ago, but it's the same franchise.

name: Robin Simmons
text: I enjoyed the convenience of ordering online. Pizza hut in Montevallo did a wonderful job. The service was great and the food was delicious!

name: R B
text: Ordered three pizzas, all three were over cooked, all three pizzas were not cut all the way through and very difficult to cut. I had my elderly father pick up the pizza due me being ill and needing to feed the kids. My dad didn’t look at the pizza or didn’t realize how over cooked it was and he had no way of knowing about the pizzas not being cut through. Regardless it should have not been served to customers. I called to address the issue the manger did not apologize once, in fact he sounded like he didn’t care at all. He just offered a credit for one pizza. I was suppose to have a credit from their last mess up, but didn’t push it and wanted to give them another try when placing the order. Whoever is in charge at the moment is doing a terrible job.

name: Mustang Concepts
text:
Worst EVER!!! Ordered pizza, waited 101 minutes for said pizza to arrive. Needless to say the pies  resembled cardboard wheels with cheese. As for the bread sticks, well they would have served a better purpose as rubber chew toys for the pooch!! I called the store and waited 27 minutes to speak to a manager, only to have the phone hung up by some over achieving pizza clerk who didn't even bother to check if someone was on the line. HELLOOOOOOO!!!!!!!.
YOU CANT FIX STUPID and for a college town, there sure are a LOT of IGNORANT people here!!!

name: Kathy Hughes
text: Pizza is soggy. Has large chunks of green peppers.The cinnamon bread is good and the delivery drive was nice.

name: Taylor Coe
text: Terrible. Used to work there and it’s only gone downhill. Had a two and a half hour wait for just wings and fries. Would have picked it up but the woman on the phone claimed my number didn’t work. I don’t even like the pizza, but the wings are much better than Dominoes.

name: Dinki Wheeler
text: Good service hot food just the calzones had barely any meat or cheese

text: Great Quality Pizzas with Delicious Toppings. Crispy Base is my Favorite and they made that really good. Awesome staff always their to help. When i went inn This place was Rushed by People but they Served me my pizza in just 20min. Surely Visit again.

name: Coonass
text: Good pizza, bad location. I'd eat there again.

name: Jesse Dalton
text: Crust was outstanding. Toppings and cheese in good proportion. Sauce on the pizza was good. The marinara that came with the Calzone wasn't what I expected. It was like a cross between marinara and hot sauce. I'm not sure this was intended, but it gave a unique bite to it. All in all it was a pretty outstanding shop, they sell by the slice, so make a great lunch option.

name: Curt Granger
text: Great restaurant and great service. Other reviews said "worst pizza"?? I don't know what they ordered, but Papa Saia's ALWAYS serves up a great pizza for me. Their Supreme pizza is LOADED with toppings (enough for two pizzas), and I always end up bringing some home, reheat the next day, and have another meal from it. The All Meat pizza is great too. And yes, I've had Slice, Davenports, Dave's, and Tortuga's, so I am very familiar with pizza in Birmingham, thank you.

name: Sheryl Strickland
text: Very nice! Sitting on the patio listening to a guy playing the guitar & watching the beautiful waterfall is just an amazing setting!! Food is great!! 😆

name: Ben Lawson
text: Always a good time to sit outside and look at the waterfall. The service is usually great and friendly. Down home atmosphere where you can have fun.

name: David Farris
text: If you love wings and love pizza, you definitely need to try their wing pizza. My wife and I always order a large so we have left overs. Also their gooey fries are awesome, they're not your typical cheese fries.

name: Lynnette Burton
text: Could not sit on the patio because the music was so loud that you would have to scream to be heard.  This is not a club, it is a sports bar.  Wings were very good.  They were sold out of oysters.  Bathroom had no handtowels.  Waitress vigorously swept the carpet at the front door while we sat 5 feet away with a table full of food.  The doors and windows were open creating the breeze that was carrying all the dust from the sweeping right into our faces and our food.  I cannot believe that this was my choice for a night out.  Will never go back

name: Josh Buchanan
text: Great place to visit and we always love sitting outside near the waterfall. The wait staff is friendly but they always seem to mess our order up in some way. Its no big deal but its the only thing keeping them from a perfect score.

name: Hewy NoSleep
text: Great location with Tiki deck and a view of the waterfalls. At night, the falls are lite up by the city. During lunch they have a great meat and three menu. Also a great location for Football games in the bar are and deck.

name: W Price
text: Good wings and great pizza.  Nice option for seating by the Cahaba River's Buck Creek dam in Old Town Helena.  Friendly staff, plenty of TVs for game day watching.  Good happy hour & daily beer prices.

name: Beau Helton
text: Blind hostesses estimated a 20 minute wait when there were two open tables outside before giving us the table directly in front of the entertainer's speaker. The wings were dry, and the onion rings were fried too long and were greasy.

name: Life Is Brewtiful
text: Good food, good food prices. Beer selection is ok but a lil expensive for bottle prices. I enjoy the patio and it's waterfall view. Staff was accommodating

name: Lou Latham
text: Undoubtedly the worst pizza I have ever eaten.  It appeared the crust with sauce was cooked in advance and then toppings added to order later.  In my case, much later.  Ordered the supreme.  The toppings looked as though they had never seen the inside of an oven.  The bell pepper was raw and the mushrooms and pineapple were out a can.  Won't be back.

name: Scott Smith
text: Good atmosphere.  Deck overlooks the creek.  Live music outside.  Great drink selection.

name: Dee Clark
text: Family friendly place. Smoking allowed on the deck. Baby changing stations in both men's and women's restrooms. Food was okay

name: Alan Floyd
text: This is my place during football season. I love them more since adding fried Wickles to their menu. I'll give them a five star when they finally get started carrying my favorite beer (Hoegaarden). ;)

name: Dill Weed
text:
My 3 experiences here have left me just "okay" at best. I certainly would not recommend sitting inside, under any circumstances. There's a bar, pool table, and benches, but the entire restaurant smells like smoke (and trash), so sit outside.

Which leads me to the good part. They have a nice outdoor deck, right next to the water, plenty of trees, so for sitting somewhere outside during good weather, this place is perfect for just kicking back a few brewskies and chatting with friends outside.

Calzones are too expensive, but they are good and you can totally share one with your wife.

They do have music outside/inside a few times a week, usually a 1 person guitar act.

name: Mary Ann Stephens
text: Very disappointed with service and food last night.  After waiting an hour to get our food and restaurant not full.  Our order was a total disaster.  Our appetizer came out with order which is a pet peeve of mine.  Jalapeno peppers were asked to be put on the side and they were all over it.  My boyfriend ordered a meat pizza and jalapeno peppers were put all over it and all the waitress said was I'm sorry and offered no resolution.

name: Tina Olive
text: I came for the first time today for the crawfish boil. The crawfish had a good taste but were overcooked and tough. About 10 of the crawfish didn't have tail. I also bought crab claws thinking they were boiled but they were fried. I also told them I didn't want the sides it came with and they didn't change the price.

name: Ray Uzun
text: Good food and perfect for families! The back patio has views of the water

name: Gene Horton
text: Moved back to original location in Alabaster. I live in Alabaster, so this is FABULOUS!

name: Julia Peart
text: Love their food and eating on the patio is a must....

name: Leland Smith
text: Awesome burger and brew. Would be 5, but they allow smoking.

name: Tom Pappas
text: Great pizza and service.

name: Karen Boolos
text: Love this place! Hate they are moving!

name: Eric Godsey
text: Restaurant half empty on a fri night but still 30 min wait!? Clearly poor planning and not enough help. Going to the competition instead.

name: Edwin Leal
text: Good local bar

name: kelby godwin
text: The food is good

name: Tony Padgett
text: Great wings!

name: DJ RaptorXS
text: Deep dish "Pie" is a must-try!  It takes a little time (~45mins) for pick-up, but it's totally worth the wait.

name: Joseph Woods
text: Delicious pizza pies and very friendly staff.

name: Melissa Pancner
text: Best deep dish pizza ever

name: Joseph Pearce
text: Great for Chicago style in Bham.

name: Leandra Mullins
text: Fast friendly and very safe. Always kept mask on properly and sanitized very well.

name: TC_ Monkey
text:
(Translated by Google) Morioho🎀 Morioho🎀 Morioho💕
Morioho🎀 Morioho🎀 Morioho🎀
Morioho🎀 Morioho🎀 Morioho💕

Morioho🎀  Morioho🎀 Morioho🎀

name: Kenadie Wright
text: Placed an order online at 7:50, order was in prep stage until around 8:50 before it jumped straight to ‘Quality Check’. Before the order status changed I had called twice, both times on hold for more than 20 minutes before I hung up. Not a single person picked up, it is currently 9:30 and it is still saying it’s being ‘Quality Checked’. I’m praying I get anything at all, since my card has already been charged. Almost three hours and it hasn’t even left the store yet. All I ordered was 1 pizza, I understand being understaffed, or having a lot of orders, but three hours is more than plenty time to throw in a single extra large pizza.

name: Kimberly Stephens
text: Ordered at 8:30pm, 10:20pm still was in “prep” status, called and it would just hang up. 10:30 pm it showed in app moved to bake, 10:46pm said “Dave was on his way”, 11:45, still no pizza and now on hold 29 minutes and counting but I’m sure pointless. Money taken, no pizza, worse experience.

resp.text: We are so sorry to hear that you did not enjoy your experience with us. We strive to offer a pleasant experience to our customers and apologize again that we did not meet your expectations. We will share your feedback with our team and work on improving our service.

name: John Huffman
text:
I ordered from this location in error, due to using the same items....website defaulted to this Orange Beach location, insted of my local Stockbridge, GA location.
I called the store when noticed this mistake and waited over 30 minutes until it showed out for delivery and No One ever answered, I had to contact the hotel I stayed at a week prior to advise the delivery driver of this error.

I did again contact this location again after calling the hotel and spoke to a lady, who advised would connect me to the manager. Again, I was on hold around 30 minutes before the call dropped after no answer.

I called a 3rd time and a gentleman stated that, he would connect me to the manager.....which again I waited on hold 30 minutes to no answer.

I had to reach out to Dominos Corp. Customer Care for a refund. I hope to have this problem resolved soon.

name: Sarah Wood
text: Placed order on app at 6:43, it is now 8:23 and still no pizza.  Tried to call and unable to get an answer! I would like to cancel my order but unable to get anyone to answer the phone. I understand everyone is short staffed but please don’t leave an estimated time of 34-44 mins. If you are in a hurry or want to eat soon, don’t bother with this place. Edited to add: 9:04 and still haven’t received our order!!!

name: jason hunt
text: We ordered 2 pizzas for delivery and was given a 60 to 70 minute wait time. After two hours and 8 calls between four people who was put on hold every time and never picked up, we decided to drive down to the pizza place. They did say it was "in delivery" but we both know it wasn't. We got both pizzas fresh and a refund. I wouldn't order here again. "Welcome to orange Beach"! As the manager told us ;)

name: Steve Murray
text: Ordered a medium pizza and a pasta at 745. Showed prepping for about an hour so I decided to call but was continously hung up on. Once someone finally stayed on the line I asked to cancel the order ( simple enough ) NO it wasn't. They said I would have to speak to a manager and would hang up. So at this point I don't want the food but I figured I'm in it now so we waited. Fell asleep around 1130 and never got our pizza and we never got our money back. Unfortunately I had to cancel my card and report it as fraud to bank. Management wouldn't it have been easier to just refund money if you can't deliver on service?

name: Kyle Lavoie
text: I don’t know why there are a decent bit of bad reviews but I ordered pizza and it got to me very quick (and hot) the guy who delivered was cool. The only thing I had a problem with was the guy on the phone was very confusing but he still tried his best so I appreciate it. Service was great all in all

name: Mason Hunt
text: Great Job on making me wait about 1 hour and 30 waiting for a manger about two pizzas we already ordered and now are still waiting on! I’m NEVER getting dominos again, this is the last straw! Wish I could rate it a 0 star, because this place shouldn’t even be up

resp.text: We are so sorry to hear that you did not enjoy your experience with us. We strive to offer a pleasant experience to our customers and apologize again that we did not meet your expectations. We wish we could hire more staff in order to better serve our customers.  I'll be sure to share your feedback and we will continue to work at serving our customers better.

name: Hamilton Reid
text: This is a scam do not give them any information. It is a bunch of Afghanistan freaks trying to steal your information and you will never get a pizza no matter how hungry you are

name: Rob Black
text: Walked in and ordered at the counter.  Staff was friendly.  Food was done in about 10 minutes.  My meat pizza was good.

name: Linse Meadows
text: An hour late and our food still hasn’t shown up. No humans to talk to. I wouldn’t recommend ordering from here.

name: Alexander M. Ulm
text: Tried calling in, had difficulty with the automated line. Received a call back to help finish my order. Order went well and got text alerts on progress.

name: Victoria Stemmans
text: We had issues with the delivery, but the employees were so helpful and made sure we were taken care of! Thank you!

resp.text: Thank you so much for taking the time to review your experience with us. We apologize for any issue that you had and we are happy to hear that it was taken care of!  We hope to serve you again soon!

name: dustayla1
text: Good luck with the non existing customer service!

name: Bart Willis
text: Worst customer service possible!

name: Kenny Mcnemar
text: Life savers.

name: Stephen Williams
text: Cheap Pizza.  Fast service.

name: Cranking Horses
text: Food is never consistent.Last visit guy was great but sold me a pizza from the warmer that apparently has been sitting ended up my whole family got sick,Pizza was not hot but warm which I live 1 minute away.Hot foods should be held no less than 140  degrees folks. Been in the fast food for 20 yrs so am not upset fix it so others don't get sick and cost you way more than this review.

name: Dottie Engle
text: Very good and employee was definitely on it to have food ready. He seemed to be by himself and handling things great.  Nice manners too. We'll definitely be going back

name: Alana Maske
text: Sat at the window for at least 5 minutes with no sign of anyone in the store at all. Finally pulled off and someone drove up behind me and someone came right to the window. Not sure if they just didn't hear when I pulled up but they should at least check for customers every couple minutes if they aren't going to be in the front area. The pizza was really good and the guy who took my order was nice. He saw my baby crying when he brought out the pizza and told me to hang on a second and he ran inside and got him a couple packs of cookies. That was really sweet.

name: Clifford Shiver
text: Wow, I was pleasantly surprised to find new people working here. Store was clean and employees spoke to you with a smile. When bread sticks didn't rise properly, I was told about the issue and not just find out later. Manager even asked if I had the time to wait for another batch to finish, at no charge. Happy to see a difference.

name: Keith Delp
text: Voted best value eating several years in a row. Fresh, hot pizza for cary out. Experienced employees make for high quality, accurate orders. The drive through is an added bonus.

name: Cj Harkless
text: This location is now a Domino's Pizza, I tried calling the number for an updated address, in which I wasn't provided an answer.

name: Aaron Ziegler
text: I would give it less than one star if I could. I don't know how much money I've spent here, but they have got my last dollar. Absolutely the worst service. The last several times I've tried to get pizzas, nothing was hot, fresh or ready to eat. The pizzas are poor quality, but even so if you had an $8 ready pizza, you'd sell them all day long. This franchise owner is losing thousands and thousands of dollars because just like me, multiple cars are pulling out of line hungry, pissed off and headed somewhere else to spend our money. There's no place thats still open in this town that has as bad a reputation. Good luck keeping the lights on.

name: Jennifer Terrell
text: Since they have a new management team.. the service there is freaking AWESOME.. NO WAIT TIME... AND THE new smokehouse is so good...

name: Carolyn Price
text: Terrible.  I called at 9:07 to order 6 large pizzas.  I was told that he had sold his last pizza and he was cleaning so he could not make them.  We called Pizza Hut and they were more than happy to make the sell and to get a new customer.  It is a shame that your business does not want to keep their customers.

name: Jade Xoxo
text: I love them but the only thing is they don’t take the pizza to your house

name: Mallorie Ruffin-Wesley
text: There pizza is great...but sadly  it's normally a long wait.

name: Michael Hudnell
text: Food and service has continued to get better since new management took over.

name: man of means by no means
text: Needs new management!!! I love the pizza. But sometimes it's an hour and a half before closing time and they say they're closed and not making any more pizza. Like literally it will be supposed to close at 11 On Friday night .according to the business hours on the door .and I get  there at 930.and nobody comes to the Window.i honk the horn.dude comes to the Window and goes "uhm were not making any more pizza tonight " .this happens all the effin time!!! Serious problem guys!!

name: Larry Beauchamp
text: When I drove up to the drive up window the buzzer sounded to alert the employees someone was at the window.  I waited a few minutes and backed up so the buzzer sounded again.  I did that once more and no one came.  At FIVE full minutes I called them. I told the person I had been at the window for five minutes.   She asked if no one had taken my order and I said no.  The manager,  who answered the phone,  stuck her head around the corner to see me and she was eating something.   Shortly someone came and took my order.  Poor, poor customer service and a bad way to run a business.

name: DJ Williams
text: I ordered a simple cheese pizza with breadsticks and marinara. They charged me for the Italian cheese bread. They told us there would be an 8-10 min wait on the pizza. We parked then I realized the breadsticks error so I went inside. I told Jerry J. of my issue with the receipt and he said ok then walked off in the back without further explanation. He started putting together my order as requested in front of me then I handed him the receipt. He looked at it then placed it back down without word and went to speak with a male in the back. He then returned stating that the manager is coming. Then Jerry walked off without ever saying another word or making eye contact the entire time I remained there. 28 minutes by the way after receiving the order for the manager to finally come to correct the charged receipt. During this time, he was filling pans with crusts. A female took about 3-4 drive thru orders then 3 orders were taken in store by her and Jerry.  One guy had to return a pizza that was given incorrectly to his wife earlier. The manager did come over to the register once, but next spoke with me or any of the other customers to inquire who had the issue. He then rushed off to grab pizzas after standing by the register ~3-5 mind awaiting the female processing drive thru orders. After pulling the pizzas, he began 2 other tasks including filling pans with crusts again. The female finally asked if had been helped and I stated no I haven't. She apologized and went to tell the manager again. He finally came back and began working with the register without saying a word. It took 3-5 mins of him tapping the register, shaking his head at it, to finally say that he voided it and required my card again. This was unnecessarily long and disregarded attending to the client who already paid versus the more recent customers who should have been put on hold until our order was corrected.

name: Ben Baggett
text: We don't have it anymore ☹️

name: Valerie Mitchem
text:
Waited 30 minutes for fresh pizza. It doesn't take that long to cook pizza .

Went back last night and the pizza was old.

name: Jesus Christ
text: Fast but lacks on quality and taste

name: Jason Kyle
text: Awesome food always prompt service

name: Johnny Hunt Jr
text: I just left there at 9:32 July 7, 2016 my order number was #136 and Danielle the manager told me and my family we could not order a 3 meat pizza because she shut her ovens down and only had 4 pepperoni pizzas and 1 cheese because my mother in law doesnt like the cheese and pepperoni and i know from being a Previous employee at that location when Eddie Gaines was manager that the customer comes first and it only takes 8 minutes to make the pizza, she didnt even apologize and said she wasnt making the pizza , i also have her on video because her customer service was very poor and unacceptable, i know this is a franchise and i will reach out to the owner and inform him of the service His employees are giving to customers.

name: matt Phillips
text: 25 mins in line and then another 15 mins to cook my food. Service could have gave me a heads up on waiting longer before they grabbed my money.

name: Bremda Kinnick
text: Busy place on a Friday night.Worth the wait.THEY ARE GONE

name: Heather Wilson
text: The employee was super rude. We didn't get our Italian cheese sticks... so I sent my husband back in to get them and they sent him out with just plain sticks... the price isn't worth the disappointment!

name: Pat Kolb
text: Pizza is OK, really good deal for the price.

name: Rhonda Gardner
text: Great service, good pie

name: Brandon Collins
text: No longer in Bay minette al

name: w.j. Macc (Jmacc)
text: Not enough help service was very slow

name: Gad'dreal The crazy Spaniard
text: Best pizza ever! 0.0

name: carrie Vick
text: The man at the window was fast and  friendly

name: April Craft
text: Nice people

name: Christy Larkin
text: Fast friendly service.

name: Bigg Tod
text: 3 o'clock no pizza ready. Make them as people come in. Made us wait 10-20 minutes

name: Christina Clark
text: Wish they had turkey pepperoni

name: Susan Parsons
text: Little Caesars has stepped up their game!

name: Haley Bryars
text: Very fast

name: Robert Brown
text: Good service

name: Sharon Wilson
text: I like there pizza

name: Victoria Jones
text: Always takes forever

name: H A R R I N G T O N
text: They just opened today so all the little quirks were understandable. My order was placed at 5:08 pm and the ticket said 6:08pm so of course they didn't have it. They asked my name about 50 times while I was waiting and I had to wait 20 minutes longer than expected but everyone was friendly helpful and the pizza was hot fresh and exactly what I ordered. Definitely better than other nearby pizza places. Keep it up!

resp.text: H Thank you SO MUCH for your review!  -Howie's Support Team

name: Tracy Brown
text: I love this place. I eat here every Friday or Saturday

resp.text: Tracy, we really appreciate your feedback about our Birmingham pizza place. We’ll share this with our team.

name: veronica wilson
text: Food was hot and delicious. Kids loved it. I loved it. We most definitely will be visiting again 👍🏼

resp.text: Veronica, we love hearing this! Happy to serve you your favorite pizza anytime 🍕

name: Emmett Haislip
text: Can't comment about delivery but I've been twice and Wife went once. The customer service up front has been great. The food has been equally good. Best option around here with the pizza chains.

resp.text: Emmett Thank you so much for the great review!!! - Howie's Support Team

name: Rhea Blankenship
text: I found a hair baked into my pizza. I filed a complaint online and never heard back from anyone. Before this, I had positive experiences.

resp.text: Hi Rhea, we want to fix this! Please reach out to us at (248) 414-3300 and Press 3 when you have a moment so we can follow up with you directly.

name: Ivan (Van aka LoranTheShaman)
text:
I ordered the Large two-topping deep dish Meal De for $10.99 but the app charged $14.98 instead of $12.09.

I tried calling it in and they did the same. Even when the manager finally changed it, they did not say what was wrong or that they would fix the app.

Check the totals!

resp.text: Ivan We are so sorry to hear that this was the experience you received at one of our locations. We will be contacting the owner regarding your issue. To help resolve your problem, please contact us at https://www.hungryhowies.com/contact-us-0

name: jules
text: No one had gloves on handling food or washing  hands after using cash register and surfaces them went back again to help get food ready for pick up . I questioned if they don’t wash hands after touching surfaces etc and was told he didn’t touch the food .   Didn’t have one of my pizzas included in order and told me to wait another 5 min or so longer . After I asked about hand washing and gloves about 2 min later every one started using gloves. Washing hands and wearing gloves is part of Hungry Howies guide lines on website especially if you touch any surfaces .

resp.text: It breaks our heart to hear that you bad experience at our pizza place. However, we appreciate you bringing this to our attention. Please contact us at https://www.hungryhowies.com/contact-us-0 so that we can get this to the store's owner and have your issue resolved.

name: Tommie Phillips
text: Need to get better staff they were horrible

resp.text: Hi Tommie, we are so sorry to hear the service you received wasn't up to par! Please reach out to us here when you have a moment: (248) 414-3300 and Press 3

name: Ronnie C
text: Went to Hungry Howies...excited because it's been about 9 years since we've been. Drove all the way to bham from past jasper....wasted time and gas as the doors were locked but website said it was open!!!!

resp.text: It breaks our heart to hear that you bad experience at our pizza place. However, we appreciate you bringing this to our attention. Please contact us at https://www.hungryhowies.com/contact-us-0 so that we can get this to the store's owner and have your issue resolved.

name: Gaylen Layton
text: Love their salads and pizzas!!!

resp.text: Gaylen, we love hearing you enjoyed our salads and pizza. Thanks for ordering lunch with us!

name: Nuespeed9948
text: Papa Johns has always been one of my personal favorite places to get pizza. However in this area I would have to say this one would be my personal favorite. I believe the pizza here is served with a better quality than the other ones around. I will most definitely be coming back to this one.

name: Nina Wesley
text: The quality at this location is beyond poor.  I was so excited to get a Papa Johns close by.  Last 2 pizzas, the crust was burnt.  All 3 pizzas I've had thus far was sorely lacking in pizza sauce and cheese...I've always been extremely pleased with my pizza purchases from this chain but im sorry to say I cannot purchase again from this location..sigh...oh well, back to Dominoes

name: April Farr
text: Definitely didn't have a good experience. My order was no where near correct and thats on top of almost an hour wait for it to be delivered. Asked for extra sauce and got none on both pizzas. One was so dry had to throw it away. I will definitely use a different location from now on. Save your money.

name: Yves Diallo
text:
First time ordering at this location: Fresh ingredients, pizza taste ok .We did not like the wings.
Second time : we ordered BBQ chicken pizza with extra sauce. It was a dry pizza.

name: Chris Edmondson
text: First time ordering from this store and I'm not happy!! Tried the philly steak papadia and it doesn't have much toppings! Y'all gotta do better for peoples money! I'm on my lunch break and very disappointed! I wasn't expecting the world for $6, but this was just unsatisfying.....

name: Lynda Robinson
text: Ordered a small pizza and most of it was crust.  Who needs 2 1/2 to 3 inches of crust on an 8 to 10 inch pizza.  They need to do better

name: Intentional Wanderer
text: Great if you check your order to make sure you got it all. Current work environments have lead to a lot of new staff and staff turn over. They are doing great though so far.

name: Cynthia Perry
text: I love this location! Especially the manager John! He is always so helpful, making sure I have everything I need each and Everytime I order!

name: Charlotte White
text: Great service and excellent pizza!

name: Ricardo Salazar
text:
(Translated by Google) All very rich and fast

(Original)
Todo muy rico y rápido

name: Shane P
text: Great local spot with friendly staff and delicious food. The cheesy garlic focaccia bread was fantastic, and the owner/bartender went over the top to provide fun conversation and great information about the menu. Prices are fair and portions are large. We had the jalapeño honey pizza with white sauce and the supreme pizza with red sauce, both are delicious. Highly recommend this local gem in the Five Points area.

name: Camryn Cook
text: The food was delicious. I got to build my own personal pizza and it was just enough! Our server was also very good and attentive.

name: jennifer williams
text:
I’m not a pizza fan. This one of my husband’s favorite pizza spot; however, he has never dined in.  On this past Sunday, we decided to dine in this location for date night. From the time we walked in to finish everything was AMAZING. The atmosphere was beautiful and serene. Our waitress was absolutely beautiful and she had the attitude to match. I can’t remember her name, but she was blonde with a French braid in her hair. She was super knowledgeable about the menu down to the ingredients. She helped me make up my mind on my choice of pizza I wanted to order. All food was brought out in a timely manner, including drinks and appetizers.

The cook was also really nice and super kind. She served our food and acted as a waitress as well.

This was really, really a pleasant and great experience. The food was amazing and worth every dime. We will definitely be frequent visitors. Great job guys, definitely five stars.

name: Ben Hayley
text: Pizza was simply bad. Cold. Very few toppings. Very little sauce. Uninspired salad. Not worth a second chance. Stay away. And I really wanted to like it. I live in neighborhood and love pizza. So hard to mess it up, but they managed on every level.

name: Winona West
text: I picked up my order and she was outside on the patio greeted me ❤ was such a wonderful place ill definitely come back to Iron city pizza 🍕 when I'm back in Birmingham! We definitely enjoyed it would recommend to ANYONE 😍 she payed the 1.40$ that I was short on meant more to me than she'll ever kno 🥺💞

name: Alban Sims
text: Felt like I was getting a NY style pizza. Cooked to perfection and pricing couldn’t have been better. If you want a good pizza this is the place to go!!!

name: Decosta Hampton
text: My first time going here and whoa!! I called in an order but by the time I get there the power is out in half of the Southside. I went in and was greeted by a young woman. I told her the name on the order and she went about making sure the order was correct. After letting me know she added more items to satisfy my wife's order for a Caesar salad, she came to the counter and said your order is free because the power was out and she had no way of finding it on her laptop. I knew she couldn't see my face because of my mask but I was in awe!!! I thought to myself she's got me!! I love and appreciate that kind of customer service. The pizza was great!! Thanks Iron City Pizza for a great first experience!!

name: Jerome Bert
text: We had dinner this evening...it was pretty decent. We started off with the garlic cheese bread and then had the supreme pizza. The crust was crisp yet chewy. It was really good. I would have liked to have had a better beer selection to go with my pizza. The service was fantastic.

name: Michael Ellis
text: We were down for a med appt in the morning staying at the Indigo & needed to eat. We took a chance on Iron City and we're totally blown away. The Cesar salad was from local greens and more than we could eat. She had the pizza and I had a calzone - both were chocked with ingredients and made with a crust that made you want to take it home. Outstanding service from Lindsey made it a great meal. Highly recommended.

name: Steve Gilmer
text: Excellent pizza! I look forward to many more delicious meals at my new favorite "pie" shop.  Staff are pretty darn nice too.

name: Nick Gizzi
text: Food is freshly made. Service was exceptional. Will be back when in town

name: Lindsey Tebeau
text: Service is spectacular! Food is always hot  and delicious

name: Jeffrey Cowgill
text:
We had lunch at Iron City on their first opening lunch day. I got the field of legions mushroom pizza and it was fabulous. The truffle oil shined thru and played nicely with the crust and other flavors. They have a great crust and know how to bake a pizza.

The facility was clean and well kept. The wait staff and chef were very friendly and knowledgeable. The chef came out and spoke to us on two occasions.

I’ll definitely go back!
Urban Cowgill
May 2019

name: ALFRED C JOHNSON
text: Very good pizza, very nice service. Everyone was very nice. I will be back .

name: Snivy613
text: We had lunch here and it was great! If you are looking for a good clean dine-in restaurant during these times I would highly recommend Iron City Pizza!

resp.text: Thank you for the great feedback and recommendation!!

name: Forrest Johnson
text: I will be the first to admit that I do not like pizza and am hesitant to ever pay money for pizza; however, I wanted to take someone to get pizza. I decided upon this place after hearing positive things about it and seeing it on my walks. First off, the place is incredibly clean and has a fresh atmosphere. The location is great in Five Points South. I decided on the honey jalapeño pizza and it was incredible. This was one of the better meals that I have eaten in a long time. I finished every bite that I got which NEVER happens when I eat pizza. I spoke with the co-owner and she was incredibly kind as well was the waiter. I will definitely be back.

name: Faith Abraham
text: A forever wait 30 plus minutes but with a free terrific tea. The raspberry tea is extraordinary. Got them an extra star this time.

name: Ashley Clark
text: I LOVE IRON CITY PIZZA!! Great quality ingredients and very flavorful!!! Definitely one of the best pizza joints in town!

name: Scott Clark
text: Pizza, calmness, and apps. All were delicious. And in Five Points neighborhood which was great!

name: Zebbo Leppo
text:
Providence has blessed Birmingham with the most perfectly light but firm and flavorful crust, beautiful sauces, and melt-in-your-mouth combinations of high-quality ingredients that showcase the staff's talent.  Probably one of the two or three most consistently "worth it" restaurants in Birmingham...and there's a lot of restaurants here.

Oh, and the messages on the pizza boxes make my day, personally.

name: Kate Cunningham
text: My new Pizza spot for sure!! I had the salad with goat cheese and strawberries, and also the Arrington Arugula Pizza. I wish I had taken pictures, everything was so delicious! The owners of this place are really great people  - support local!

name: Layton Lambert
text: Great pizza in a hidden spot. Crust is amazing definitely would recommend

name: Thomas White
text: Pizza was excellent and cooked with passion!

name: Grace Bivin
text: Absolutely the best pizza I've EVER had!!! Fresh ingredients, beautiful presentation and absolutely the best service! My boyfriend lives 2 and a half hours away, he has now eaten there twice and tells me on a regular basis to "ship me some iron city pizza!". I always look forward to visiting, tasting their signature cocktails and devouring the DELICIOUS pizza!!! P.s. the cannolis are pretty good too! 😉

name: La VONDA JONES PRIMUS
text: Delicious pizza! Very fresh and tasty toppings!  Awesome crust! It is just right! Open, airy, friendly atmosphere. Great staff! Amanda rocks! Cool location. Going back soon!

name: Eva Teresa Virciglio Holmes
text: Had the Vulcan Veg for take out , so good!

name: tori watkins
text: BEST PIZZA IN TOWN!!! And salads are AMAZING. One of my fav bham spots.

name: Jessica Morris
text:
Finally went and checked out this place last weekend and it’s definitely my new fave! The owner was super nice and so accommodating - a really great experience! Wishing her much success on her new restaurant!
Even better, the pizza! I’m a fan of the delicious thin crust and that they offers ricotta as a topping! Ha!
I will definitely be back!

name: Shannon Colby
text: Super fresh and delicious.  Crust was soft yet had a good crisp.  I had the red mountain cheese with pepperoni and the side salad.  Salad was lightly dressed with homemade vinaigrette - very fresh and the dressing was perfect.  Wait staff was very friendly and attentive. We will definitely be back!

name: bruce wayne
text: Got a nice experience last day, went with some of my friends. Italian and Pizza restaurant is very busy on weekend nights. I loved the Caesar Salad, and Iron City Salad because those were very much yummy. Recommended to foodies nearby this area.

name: Lindsay Morris Hirsowitz
text: Wow! Amazing pizza, good amount of toppings, perfect crust and great sauce. Everything you want in a pizza. We showed up 20 minutes before they closed and the owner welcomed us right away. We said it was late but they didn't care. She opened it up with the chef and it is just them two. A little help from family as well. My husband and I recommend this place, help support a local business and 2 people who are starting to live their dream!

name: Jennie C
text:
I wanted to like this place. Chef owned, in my neighborhood, pizza! Sadly it was not what I had hoped.

We ordered the seasonal salad which was under dressed with wilted lettuce. Said we wanted to share the salad but then had to ask for plates to share and were given awkward wax paper lined baskets that bits of the salad could fall out of.

We also got the Southside supreme pizza. The crust was flat, chewy, and without any crunch. One side of the pizza had all the sauce while the other side was dry, and there were whole cross sectional slices of onion on 3 of the slices with no onion on any of the others. Similarly with the olives, 2-3 slices held almost all of the olives while the other slices were bare. The pepperoni was okay but the sausage tasted like breakfast sausage, no spice or Italian sausage flavor (where’s the fennel?) at all.

While we were there for lunch, they were moving things like ladders past our table and into the back and making loud noises. Our pizza also took forever to come out, and we were the only people there.

Maybe it was just a fluke, but I’ll have a hard time wanting to try iron city pizza again anytime soon.

resp.text:
We are very sorry you had anything less than a perfect experience with us. We are a small, chef owned buisness as you mentioned and value each and every customer that we serve and especially the support we receive from the local community. We would love to have you back in so that we can meet your initial expectation of us. We hope to see you again soon!

-Chef Dustin
Iron City Pizza Co

name: Benjamin Foster
text: Went out on a limb and tried this place. Birmingham has a lot of pizza places and this one is one of the best. Better than slice, post office pies. I was very pleasantly surprised.

name: swaroop venkatagiri
text: Order got messed up and we did not get the food we ordered. Disappointed with the food

name: Sami DiLorenzo
text: Really good! I'm super picky with my pizza, coming from upstate NY and this works for me. I think I like it a little more than Post Office Pies. Great crust and sauce. Try the confit garlic!

resp.text: Great feedback! Thank you!!

name: Tom Windsor
text: Great pizza. Great crust. Fresh ingredients from local sources. Friendly, involved ownership. Give them a try, you won’t be disappointed!

resp.text: So glad you enjoyed it!! Looking forward to seeing you again soon!!

name: Brooke Alexis
text: Incredible pizza. The meatballs were so good as well. I stayed at the Indigo and ordered takeout and was thoroughly satisfied. Can't wait to come back!

name: Heather Meadows
text:
Staff was incredibly friendly, food was amazing! Wish I had pictures to share, but we inhaled it!

We had the Legion Field of Shrooms pizza, delicious! The Cheesy Garlic Focaccia (marinana was perfect!) and the Berry Goat Cheese Salad (dressing was divine!).

Highly recommend, will be going back for more curbside, but honestly cannot wait until quarantine is over so I get the chance to eat inside.

Thanks Iron City Pizza, you made our night!

name: Evan Miller

The food is absolutely delicious. Have tried over half of the pizzas and they are all fantastic. Nice ambiance with a super friendly staff.
Would highly recommend!

text: Wonderful, start to finish.  Nice family place, not very expensive, great pizza and fresh salads.  Get the cannoli dessert, it'll change your life.  Love the decor, classic wood and brick and metal, cool lighting, several big TV's but not too loud, great classic rock playing. Real living flowers on every table.

name: Cheryl Brewer
text: Delicious pizza, perfect crust. Southside Special was delightful with beautiful fresh basil chiffonade. Salads looked fantastic too. Would definitely recommend but beware of their unusual hours.

text: Best thin (hand tossed) pizza in Bham.  The Caesar salad is phenomenal as well.  Give these nice folks a try.  You won’t regret it.

resp.text: Thank you very much for the great review we look forward to seeing you again soon!!

text: Ordered the Spinach and Feta Cheese Bread for an appetizer, along with the Eggplant Parm and the white lasagna florentine with chicken. Everything was very fresh and extremely tasty. The sauces were bright and full of flavor, and each item was clearly cooked right when we ordered it. Pizza dough was crazy good, maybe best in Tuscaloosa. Will be coming back.

resp.text: Thank you so much! It was a pleasure serving you today.

name: Traci Watkins
text: A friend and I had lunch here today for the first time.  It was delish!!  The portions were super large, the Greek salad dressing was really good and the salad was so fresh.  The chicken parmesan was delish as well.  Waiter was super friendly!  We will definitely be going back soon!

name: Narkeita Robert
text: This was my first time at Anthony's 10/24/15 and  I gave it three stars based on the food alone. The food was very good. However, that's where it stops.  The service was bad and the bathroom was nasty. Anthony's would be good for take out no more dining in.

name: Christopher Snell
text: Good food, friendly staff and timely service.

name: Akins Josh
text:
Went for lunch 9/9/15 approximately 1150.  It is a seat yourself place. That has its ups and downs.  Ups sit where you like, not where you are lead.  Down:  The server for that section may not know you are there.  After looking over the menu twice and discussing the options provided, roughly 10 mins; we got approached by the waitstaff for drinks.  The place was not very busy, but there were other folks there.  Got our order in. Eggplant Parm, the Italian, and order of cheese breadsticks.  It took a while for the chow to hit the table.  The Eggplant Parm was a big portion  looked really tasty.  The Italian  was wee for a 8-9 dollar sandwich, i would say less than 6 inches of it total.  The meat cuts were great though.  Cheese bread.... can't tell you just yet, as it has not arrived.  My side salad was fair.  The Greek dressing was really good.  However the onions were old as they had become translucent and the red had seeped into the meat of the veggie. My friend had to get up to get his tea refilled.  The waitress did not even acknowledge that she had not returned with his drink.  I scarfed up my sandwich after removing the onions.  Good, but not valued correctly in my opinion at the cost point.  When i had cleaned up my area, just a thing i do having been a server, my cheese breads arrived.  They came with an apology about a mix up in the kitchen. Things happen.  They were the best thing out of all that was ordered.

What this place needs to do to stay alive in a market flooded with food options :
*know that this place is new and are working on finding their rhythm

1.  Bring on better wait staff, and add another the floor
2.  Re-evaluate their price points on certain items.  There Special was a great deal!
3.  Polish the time from order to table.

I will be going back in a month or two to see how things have changed.  It has some great things going for it.  I fear that the simple things against it could keep first timers from coming back.

resp.text:
Hi Josh, thank you for your feedback. We have made some changes to our staff and changed the bread for the sandwich. It is a much better portion now. I hope you will try us again. As a new restaurant, we did have a few challenges but I feel confident that we are better now. If you have any questions or concerns, please call me at 523-7548.
Thank you again,
Tina

Best restaurant in the business! The staff is as nice and friendly as they come. Food is delicious and a great price. Ask for the S.I.S for breakfast.

I still own the Orca challenge. Good luck trying to beat me...

name: Imperator Victix.
text: Former cook in 4 / 5 star restaurant. Was surprised stopped in for lunch randomly and will return. Servor was friendly as she was beautiful and the food quality, portion was great. Ordered burger and will return.

name: Kellie Travers
text:
Stopped in about a week ago with my son and ordered a pizza with a couple of drinks.
The young waitress that I had was so nice and polite. She didn't mind at all that we wanted to switch tables closer to the TV. She even helped me with my drinks. The reason why we moved was because she changed the channel to an animated movie. Well reading the caption from where we were sitting was a little eye straining. Once we moved closer she even turned the sound on for us.
We sat there and ate a very delicious and very cheesy pepperoni pizza while we watched some of that movie.
One con to this place though.....the women's bathroom door. It's absolutely disgusting and y'all should be ashamed of yourselves for not cleaning that nastiness up! Honestly made me second guess on whether or not I should eat the food i had just ordered because I know y'all use that bathroom. You see it when you use the door. There is NO WAY ON EARTH THAT YOU CAN'T SEE IT! Better yet, just replace the door.
Having said that, I would still eat there because the food was excellent! Just please do something with the door, please.
The hours are weird...so call first.
This really is 5 star food and I will change my rating once the door is nice and clean.
UPDATE:
Ordered another pizza this time Togo and was just as delicious as the last one!!!!! Yummy. They have the best tasting pizza!!!!!

name: Mark-Anthony Jimenez
text: The food here is okay, but the portions are super skimpy. While I was eating, I could hear the staff arguing in the kitchen. I don't like the management here and find it a bad place in town to find a good meal or dining experience.

Second, I decided to get my food off of their steam table or whatever while my sister ordered from the menu. My food was terrible and they barely had enough food to choose from. I couldn't even finish my plate. My sister ordered a pizza, which was better, but not by much. I can honestly say I won't be going back to this place again.

name: Rodney Bolden
text: Good food for the price. I went for lunch and it was pretty empty for a Saturday afternoon. Food came out in a timely fashion, and was hot and ready for consumption. There needs to be a better selection of seafood, as I found it to be a little lacking. The staff was friendly and willing to help me decide on what I should try. Tables and silverware were clean, and the food area seemed to be set up in a thought out way.

name: Willie Veasey
text: Carrabba's is always good.  However, I didn't eat there this time (though i have before).  My guest and I decided we wanted some place with more vegetables, so we went to another restaurant.  The food at this Carrabba's is very good and they give you enough food to take some home for dinner.  Price is a little pricey, with the average meal being about $15, but like I said, you get enough for dinner.

name: Eric Lewis
text: Its a chain, but they do a good job with generic Italian. Fair wine selection, not extensive, but you can ask the servers if they have anything not on the list. Sit at the pasta bar for  great cooking show during dinner, and some free samples! Employees and servers usually have a great attitude!

name: William Finney Jr
text: Always a great experience, and great food! I ended up going a couple of days before it was shut down. Glad I got to enjoy it one last time.

name: Mike Poe
text: The service started out prompt and the food was great. We then ordered dessert and a glass of Remy Martin 1738. The waitress return with the dessert and check but no drink and left. After asking about the drink she said they didn't have it so I ask for Grand Mariner. 6 minutes later she said it would be just a minute. Then 5 minutes later another waiter ask if everything was ok and then offered to get the drink. A few minutes later he returned with the drink but it had something floating in it so I returned it. By the time the drink was delivered the dessert was long gone which made the drink somewhat pointless.

name: Ivy Harris
text: This place is so great!!! Nice place to go for a first date, outing with friends or family, and even a business luncheon. The staff is friendly, organized, and knowledgeable of the menu. The food is great...it's fresh and prepared as ordered. My fiancé and I go every once in a while and we have never had any complaints. We will continue to visit. I must mention that this place puts Olive Garden to shame and it's so worth the money.

name: Lisa Avalos
text: I  hate seeing bad reviews about my favorite restaurant. I've been there so many times and I've never had a problem. Service is always great and the food is always hot and delicious. The deserts are so good. I'm always picky about deserts. I've tired all the deserts at Carrabba's and I give them all a thumbs up!

name: Dave Holmes
text: The employees we interacted with were awesome Corbin, and Roy were very friendly and helpful. The food was cooked to spec. Definitely worth the money. And on a sunday too.

name: Kaitlyn Carter
text: I read the reviews and was like no let's try something else but I read a comment about experiencing it yourself and I am happy to that I did. IT WAS DELICIOUS!!

name: Mike T torri19
text: Outstanding Service! The waitress and manager were attentive and went above and beyond to make our dining experience enjoyable.

name: Josh Evans
text: Amazing food. Amazing service.  Never been disappointed here.

name: mlybgabies
text: I've tried to place an order over the phone tonight 4 times and have been placed on hold for more than 15 minutes each.  Held on the line just to see how long it would take for them to come back to the phone and nothing.  Called again only to be told could you hold for a moment please--another 15 minute wait. If this is customer service; then I'd hate to see how long it would take to get my food.  I tried online before, only to get there and my order could not be located.  This is the last straw!  Will find another Italian restaurant.

name: Crystal Wickersham
text: I've been going to this carrabbas for at least the last 4 yrs to celebrate my birthday but this year was absolutely the worst experience I've ever had at a restaurant of this scale and price. Service was horrible, took forever to get our drinks once seated after an hour wait, my first glass of wine had lipstick on rim of glass that wasn't mine, appetizers were brought out right before our main dish with salads and bread, steaks prepared wrong, mashed potatoes weren't completely done, no angel hair pasta (my absolute favorite item), and some items were never delivered... And it was not very busy by this time. Seemingly lazy, incompetent and unconcerned staff in regards to customer service and customer satisfaction. Manager was nice enough but somewhat nonchalant about the situation and I'm pretty sure I was not the first to discuss these issues with him last night and I think most of his staff should be dismissed and replaced with people who actually provide the type customer service expected when spending the amount of money we spend here every year. I was embarrassed by the end of the night to have brought my friends and family to this location and have no intentions of returning.

name: Amelia Blackwood
text: Total outrage this place closed, and with no real reason or explanation!  The closest Italian competition (by proximity, mean) was down the street - old & worn, the O.G. (Olive Garden- obviously).  This place paled in comparison to the menu at Carrabba's - free salad & breadsticks be damned...I'm willing to pay more for better quality food & service any day.

name: Juanita Washington
text: After reading the other reviews I had to correct them by saying pleases don't read come and experience this lovely restaurant for yourself. My wait time was short food came out hot waitress was very professional I can't with all of the post I read . If you are reading this judge not unless you walk in there shoes

name: Curt Brewer
text: The Creamy Parmesan dressing is EXCELLENT to dip your bread into. That is a meal in itself.

name: Hamp Dallas
text: Great!!!

name: Antron
text:
After Young Barn Oysters and Pub failed me miserably in the food department and since I was still very much starved, I ventured over to Carrabba's. Surely an Italian restaurant can't mess up Italian dishes. Hence my sarcasm.

I wanted something quick, to-go. The venue was quite busy so I knew it'd be a little while before my order was ready. No problem. But after about 40 minutes I started getting a little antsy. I walked over to the VERY friendly young woman whom I had placed my order with. She advised it'd just be a few more minutes.

She was right, my food (I ordered the Pasta Linguine w/shrimp and scallops, and a Chicken Ceaser salad), was ready in those few minutes she mentioned. My order was totally screwed--the blame could be placed on me for not checking my food before I left, but that's not my job to know their job.

My chicken Ceaser salad didn't have any chicken. They had placed the chicken that was supposed to be on the salad on the linguine. And they also placed some vegetable soup with my order. I don't even like vegetable soup. The pasta was totally dry as well, it was supposed to have a tomato, creamy sauce but maybe mine disappeared, because it certainly wasn't anywhere to be found.

I ended up at least trying to eat some of the pasta but it prematurely & intentionally went into the trash. The salad was fresh though.

With so many restaurant offerings it often hard to give a spot another shot, nothing different in this case.

name: William Streetman
text: So it takes a lot for me to get mad enough to leave a review on a restraunt. But as someone that eats out a lot, my experience earlier tonight was terrible. Our waiter forgot our drink orders, mixed up the sides, and the person that brought our food out Didn't even ask us if we wanted shredded cheese like yall ask every time. name: Destiny L
text:
I am a long time customer of Camile's, not because of the food, but because it is right next door to campus. I sometimes like to sit and grab a bite between classes. The food is bit bland, but I have never had any problems with my order. One day I did and was treated horribly for the complaint. I ordered the Camile club with no mayo. When I received my sandwich, it had mayo. So, I calmly went back up and explained that I didn't want mayo. I was told it could be fixed.

While waiting on my sandwich, I noticed the staff watching me and speaking quietly, but I ignored it. 5 minutes later I was called back and when I went to check my sandwich again, I noticed the residue from mayo. It looked as if someone had wiped the mayo off and changed the bread. Again, calmly, I went back up (once again noticing the staff snickering) and asked to speak to the manager for a refund. Said-manager whose name I couldn't get, claimed she was there the whole time they "remade" my sandwich and it was fresh. I told her that couldn't be the case because it was now cold, it took her less time to make it than originally and I showed her a piece of lettuce that had mayo in it.

She then rudely asked me if I still had my receipt, which I did. I was given a refund, but I don't appreciate the way I was treated. If I'm paying for a meal, I expect it to made the way I requested it. I didn't ask them to make me a sandwich befitting God. I just didn't want mayo.  I am never stepping foot into that cafe again.
