name: Paul Willis
text: Papa John’s,, has always been our choice in pizza delivery. However, tonight (Tuesday) my wife called for a delivery. After, placing the order, she was told it would be over an hour. Excuse me, over an hour for delivery . . . thanks, but NO thanks! This, is not Super Bowl Sunday, Iron Bowl etc! She, canceled the order . . . called Domino’s and we had a delicious hot pizza, delivered within 21 minutes!!! Domino’s now has our business!!!

name: Lord Ludicrous
text: Ordered a extra large pep pizza back on Friday afternoon only to recieve the pizza 2 hours and 38 mins later. Theirs no reason delivery times should be this long, even dominos can do better with a far high number of orders. The pizza wasnt even warm upon arrival and felt like it was refridrated by the time it reached the door.

name: Leonard Dinsmore
text: The Epic stuffed crust pizza was delicious and the service is always great.

name: david kirkpatrick
text: My family and I eat pizza far too much, usually 2 times a week. Normally I don't have too much of an issue, but tonight was especially bad. At 6:38 I got the alert that my pizza was on the way, at 7:32 it arrived. That an entire hour in a pizza bag. Either the store wanted to make their times look better or my pizza was shoved in a car with 4+ deliveries. That's a little hard to swallow, but the deeper hit, was that when he came to the door and had zero personality. I used to work in the food service and always tip 20%+. 20$ order and I tipped 6.00. Not a word said, just a shoulder shrug. No mask. No care. No customer service. Can't treat multiple repeat customers that way.

resp.text: We are sorry you had this experience with your recent order, David. We would like to try to make things right for you. Please email your order details and contact information to reviews@papajohns.com

name: Big Mama
text: Online orders take 2-3 hours to get to you. Customer service is greatly lacking at that store as well.

name: Laurie Emanuele
text: My family has always used Papa  johns in fairhope for our take out pizza. But when my husband went to pick up our pizza last week, employees were not wearing a mask. This included the ones who were making the pizzas. Unfortunately I will have to stop getting my pizzas there until they comply with mask wearing to protect the public.

resp.text:
Hello Laurie,
We are sorry to hear about your experience at this store. We would be happy to help make this right. Please send us your contact info, online order number, and a copy of your review to reviews@papajohns.com.

name: Lloyd Davis
text: I have ordered 3 times from them, all 3 times the food has been good. Delivery time was decent, I live in a not so well lit area so its hard to find. I understand the issue. Good food, good service. I recommend them.

name: Nathan Pelfrey
text: I just ordered a pizza tonight about 45 minutes before they closed and an hour and a half goes by and no pizza so I call the Fairhope restaurant asking where is my pizza and they said its on its way. Another 45 minutes goes by and no pizza so I call the restaurant numerous times and don't get an answer, so I guess no pizza tonight after I already paid for it and and gave a tip online. I've had numerous problems with my orders, them bringing me the wrong orders,, one driver that was rude and with acouple of employees. I've never seen a restaurant so messed up. They sure as hell don't mind taking my money though!! They need new management!!

resp.text: We're sorry to hear that, Nathan. Let us help. Can you please provide the email associated with the account, order number, and contact information at reviews@papajohns.com.

name: Anne Stewart
text: Ann is a great csr!!! She seems to be the person that I talk to every time and she is so friendly and helpful.

name: David Jones
text: Pizza is good and the service is ok

name: Jamie Schad
text: Speaking only of the Fairhope location. I'll give them one thing, they are consistent, consistently horrible . It's like an ex-boyfriend you keep going back because its close and convenient. Never again! I asked for extra sauce because their pizzas  are dry . If I wanted neapolitan pizza I would have gone to a brick oven joint. Tonight we ordered ahead for pizzas to be ready at 6pm. I swear they must have just cooked it at 5  and left it on that shelf for an hour. Worst Papa John's franchise EVER!!! I wish I would have checked my pizzas before I left. Daphne location is great though.

name: Brenda Copeland
text: Unfortunately this is not the first issue I had with this Papa John's.   Picked up our order, got home and found it was OVERCOOKED.  I immediately took it back.  The woman working the register appeared to be the shift manager got defensive.   She stated well it obviously we ordered well done.  I asked to seenthenordrr because I knew it wasn't.   She stated oh that's not what I meant another order was and they confused it with ours.  She did make it right by offering to remake it or refund.  However her demeanor was unpleasant.

name: Ray Reynolds
text: Yummy. Great pizza. BTW... Papa Johns garlic sauce makes everything better.

name: Edward Pendleton
text: Driver was prompt and courteous

resp.text: We are happy to hear it, Edward! Thank you for the positive review. Have a great day!

name: Latasha Pickett
text: I typically do not have an issue when ordering my  pizza online but today was the complete opposite. Delivering a few mins late is understandable.  What I cannot accept is being sent a pizza in a dented box that is coming out of the warming bag opened on one side. To top that off when I asked to see it before signing my receipt, I see this big burned bubble of dough on one side. I told the driver I did not want it and did not want it remade. To ensure my refund would be processed and returned to my card within a timely manner I decided to go to the store myself. The issue had already been addressed to management by the driver prior to my arrival as the driver sat in my parking lot several minutes before leaving and actually pulled up to the store right after I did. When entering I was greeted and I told the manager I needed to speak with her. Now in a managament position it is required that you set the bar of excellence for your employees. That did not happen here. Her demeanour was appalling. Because I have never had an issue with Manager Beth Brooke I would have gotten it remade had she shown a level of excellent and professional customer service. Instead she displayed no empathy, no apologize, no consideration.  She did not even look at me while talking to me until I said "Is your name on my receipt." Then manager Beth looked at me and said you know all you had to do was call me instead of coming up here.  No what should have happened was the pizza that came out to me should have NEVER pasted as company standards. It should have been remade at that point and notification sent out letting me know it would be late for this reason. How can a manager hold their employees accountable when they are not following protocol? Never again.

name: Edward Pendleton
text: Driver was prompt and courteous

resp.text: We are happy to hear it, Edward! Thank you for the positive review. Have a great day!

name: Lauren Barker
text: Fast service

name: R C
text: Suggest you use pickup instead of delivery. My order was over 30 minutes late and pizzas were cold.

name: D Hallford
text: As always, I made my order online and ordered a pizza with no cheese or meat for my daughter using the "make your own pizza" option.  Her pizza was delivered with cheese so I made a call to talk to explain the mistake.  The first female I spoke with was rude and condescending, explaining to me that this is "not Pizza Hut"  and you have to "take the cheese off" when you order a pizza with no cheese.  I tried to explain the way online ordering works.  She cut me off and put me on hold.  The second female I spoke with was the manager (not sure because she did not identify herself or her position).  She basically repeated what the first female said and I, again, explained how online ordering works. I explained that I make this order often and I asked her if she had ever explored the way online ordering works and that when you "make your own pizza" you don't take toppings off, instead you add toppings.  She continued to argue with a very hostile, condescending attitude.  Finally, she said that she will make me another one and said she had to go because it's raining and I need my pizza.  The driver delivered the second pizza and was very apologetic because he heard the manager speaking to me and so I gladly tipped him again.  These folks do not like to be called out when they make a mistake and they love to argue.  I feel bad for the drivers who may not get the tips they deserve due to the rude,  know-it-all attitudes of the people talking to customers.  This was not my first time having a bad experience with an incorrect order.  I wish I knew how to contact the owner.

name: Haley Gillespie
text: They are the nicest and quickest pizza place in fairhope. I always make sure to tip at least 25%, because I always get what I order and I always have a polite deliverer. It's easiest to order from and always has quality food.

name: robert darnell
text: Great pizza and friendly delivery service. Seems to be faster if presented online.

name: Alex Markley
text: I go in there every now and then and the smiles on the faces makes me feel welcome. They are very quick about getting the food out. it tastes amazing. My delivery experience was great. I love Popa John's in Fairhope.

name: Alea Nehls
text: Although the delivery man and food were great, there was a lady on the phone for the Fairhope papa johns who was incredibly rude. She was yelling over the phone and was obnoxious. Still great food tho

name: Robert Visser
text: Great pizza, short wait and nice people behind the counter.

name: Devan Hornsby
text: Every single time we order food from papa johns in fairhope I never receive all of my order. If they don't forget my 2 liter then they forget my sauce. I understand that we ordered at 8:45 and they close at 10 but when I called I could hear the employee in the back ground cursing the fact that we were ordering. On top of that they forgot three sauces that we paid for. The pizza is always sub par due to under cooking. The only reason we continue to order from this restaurant is because it is the only food place that will deliver to our house. I am sure we aren't the only customers that feel thus way.

name: Robert Visser
text: Great pizza, short wait and nice people behind the counter.

name: Jason Rush
text: These guys deliver further out than the other pizza chains in town. Fair prices and quick delivery considering i am south of 98

name: Michaela Brooke
text: Service is great and everyone is so friendly!!! I have had so many large orders done in as little as an hour!!! One of my favorite pizza places ever!!!

name: Brad Watson
text: Rude delivery driver. Pizza was burned on bottom, chewy and cold. Done with Papa Johns.

name: Victory Reliable Services, LLC
text: Good, accurate and friendly service. We get pizza from this location often and we've seen lot of different faces, but for the most part everything is being OK.

text: Geneva Rocks!!!!

name: T W
text: Above and beyond great customer service!!

name: Georgegina Powell
text: Pizza and bread sticks are great and delivery is fast.

name: Susan Johnson
text:
I wanted to give a one star; this “stuffed crust” pizza is empty and the pizza is paper thin!!! I will definitely complain to the Manager!

I did return tonight to complain about the pizza. I waited while another pizza was cooked. What I witnessed would have appalled the Health Department! Hands not being washed, touching masks that were not worn properly. The man hand tossing the dough was wearing his mask on his chin; he had a mustache (not covered!) The cooking area was so crowded, boxes dropped on floor, and no hair was covered! I saw all colors of hair and no one had it covered! The manager (of 6 months) touched many surfaces before going to hand toss dough, and she was touching her mask repeatedly that kept slipping down. So I changed my stars to ONE. There is not an option for no stars!

name: Robin Lewis
text: Second visit in 2 weeks and good service and fresh hot pizza. So good!!!!

name: Bill Kahmar
text: not good I tried the stuffed crust.The pizza  was very plain tasting.I will stick with pizza Hutt stuff crust  its much better.

name: Matthew Henry
text: I only do pickup from here, but I have never had a bad experience or gotten the wrong order.

name: Charles D
text: Pizza tasted like it was cooked with dead bodies .

name: Angel Young
text: Jonathan F. the manager at this particular Papa Johns was AMAZING. He created the best meal for us. Everything was fresh and baked with Care and Love. This was hands down our most memorable Carryout Experience. This location will always be our first choice for pizza. The customer service and experience was outstanding. Thank You Jonathan F, you are truly valuable to Papa Johns.

name: C. B. Thuss, Jr.
text: Friendly people that get good pizza right!

name: Debbie Taylor
text: The pizza at this location is awesome!! 👍👍

name: Maite Stephens
text: Of all the pizza chains out there, Papa John’s has the best pizza hands down!!!! Their sauce is sweet, their cheesticks awesome and their pizza the best. They truly have the best ingredients around 👌🏻

name: donald rollan
text: I've ordered from this branch for at least the past 13 years and always had great service/food. Obviously over the past year management has changed to someone that couldn't care less about his customer's if you had a gun to his head. I'm a business man myself, so i know all about not getting orders correct 100% of the time. However I've given this branch more than their fair share of chances. The previous reviews are correct in reference to the ridiculous delivery times, customer service and quality of food. At least the last four times I've ordered from here, my pizza was barely warm, the pizza crust was leathery as if it was microwaved and my dessert was also over cooked. To top it off, the last delivery driver i had, had an imperious attitude about him, kind of like he was doing me a favor for delivering a pizza to me. I gave him what i thought to be a generous tip after my two hour wait. I said " thanks, have a good night" all i got in return was "uh huh". I wanted to knee cap the guy and take my $8 back. To the manager that owns this place, grow some balls and get your employees under control already.

name: Harold Bowdoin
text: The person that answered was not very helpful,  wanted me off the line and move on i felt.  Pizza was cold when we picked it up at their specified time.  There were discounts available they didnt offer .  The gave me cheese bread instead of bread sticks.  Overall very pathetic for a simple pizza order.

name: Desi Collins
text: Ordered pizza for my daughter and her friends for dinner last night and my pizza arrived cold, greasy, and bunched up on one side of the box. Some pieces were folded and flipped upside down. Called the store and she said in the most annoyed voice ever that she would replace it and that it would take an additional 35-40 minutes for delivery or I could come in. I live ONE MILE away from the store. It shouldn’t take that long to correct something you all messed up. Secondly, I paid for delivery so that I wouldn’t have to leave the house. I’ve ordered from this location about 4 times since I’ve moved here. Every single time but ONCE my pizza has been cold. Now this. Last time ordering from them.

name: Danny Dyess
text: Staying at 226 Summit Parkway in Homewood. We call to order a pizza and Robert answers the phone. After giving Robert my info he says we were out of his delivery area. I said Robert you're only 2.6 miles away. Doesn't matter says Robert. OK where should I call to get an order. Robert gives me another number to call. I call the number. I tell the young man the problem so he calls Robert. Still can't get a pizza. Next location is 2.8 miles away. What is wrong with this picture?  OK, thanks Zaxby's for a cheaper and better meal.

name: Elex Harris
text: I've used this location for delivery and carry out quite a few times. The staff is always nice, the pizza is always good/fresh, and they've always been really fast with my orders. Highly reccomend.

name: TeDarius Forrest
text: Love there pizzas! Be worth the extra money!

name: Wesley Sparks
text: Make sure you have your stove warm so when your pizza gets there you can warm it up 😤

name: Parker Allen
text: Help me get my pizza on with great care for the delivery costumer!😲

name: Jason Walter
text: We were having a horrible week.  From potential home damage because of hurricane Harvey, to trying to drive home to Texas and almost losing my family in a freak car accident/ fire.  We are staying at a neat by La Quinta Inn and thought we'd get pizza.  I guess I was speaking with the manager because he gave us the two large pizza's for free because of our misfortunes.  My family will never forget the kindness of this store!  It might not seem like much but it meant a lot to us.

name: Matt Haynes
text: Ordered 2 pizzas tonight one was not at all what I ordered.  Called the store and as if writing this message I have been on hold for 9 minutes.  Unacceptable that when you spend $30 on 2 pizzas.  Donato's here I come.

name: Jeannie Smith
text: I ordered a puzza took 1.5 hrs to never receive it. When I called the manager was rude and disrespectful. He also refused to give me corporates number. When I went up there to get the number not only was he high as heck his emplyees had no problem getting high right in front of the store. I later found out not only did his driver request the incorrect room hr sold my order to someone at the hotel. I wonder if all this was because of the color of my skin. I will never return to this place ever. I also do not reccomend this place to anyone

name: Curtis Faulk
text: You should be personally and professionally embarrassed by the product you delivered. I wish I could post a photo of what showed up in a box at my house. But, since I can’t it’s on Facebook and public. Never again.

name: Nick Morros
text: I am a long time vestavia resident and each and every time I order from this location, they are not professional nor courteous in the least. There are specific delivery instructions that I have been using for years and each time I relay the same information "every" time I call, the rep says they have put it into their system... in addition, the staff and management are not helpful and do not care to sell a pizza at all. I'm glad I'm not the owner of that establishment/ potential franchise. This location could do much better and certainly be more profitable. Bad staff and management = decreased revenues, certainly mine.

text: Overpriced Pizza ver light on the toppings

name: Jarrod Cook
text: Normally prompt and great pizza. The first time I pre-order so it’s delivered right at game time and it’s 30 minutes late. I call to cancel and the guy on the phone is rude then hangs up on me.

name: Ruben Williams
text:
Incredibly rude staff that couldn't care less about their jobs. I ordered from here 3 times after I moved to the area 4 months ago. Every single time I walked in to pick up my order no one greeted me. They stood 10 get away carrying on their personal conversations. They were facing me so they knew I was there. When they finally came over the first words out of their mouths were, "What do you want?" And nothing else was ever said. No thanks, no have a good day, nothing.
If I hadn't paid online I would have just left. This branch needs to get their crap together.

text: Person on the phone wasn’t interested in helping. Honestly it wouldn’t surprise me if she was being forced against her will to answer the phone. Then they gave us an overdone (almost burnt pizza). Maybe the oven is up too hot and burning the pizzas and the people out.

name: Aries Gates
text: I wish it was a way to not give a star! Here goes, I was ordering online but the deal it offered wouldn't let me select more than 2-toppings for a any topping pizza so I decided to call the store. Whoever is running this place doesn't have a lick of customer service when I told him the issue I was having placing order online but I could place over phone he told me to call  the online hotline for any issues. He didn't in anyway think to say let me help you place the order. Let me just say if we don't order PIZZA from you, You don't have a JOB!

name: Raven Howard
text: Ordered a pizza, entered my address and the order went right through. I then called the store to check on my order and the manager assured me it was on its way. I get a call atleast 30 minutes later saying he couldn't deliver my pizza because my address was out of their delivery zone. They refused to deliver my pizza. I don't understand why this wasn't communicated to me when I called? The papa johns near me is now closed and I am without food. Thanks guys.

text: I was traveling and tried to order pizza for delivery to the hotel I was staying at and they wouldn't even take my order until I got the address. how the hell am I supposed to know the stupid address of a hotel in a place I don't even live so I ordered from Domino's instead I will remember and never try and order from this papa John's again

name: Jacob JingleHeimer Long
text: Fresh pizza made exactly how you choose. A plethora of menu pizzas or an extensive variety of toppings for your personal "create your own" pizza. Gluten free options as well as vegetarian. The average price of the menu pizzas range from $10 to $18 without modifications. The "create your own" pizzas can get pricey being that each topping cost roughly $1.25 ,but the portions are well worth the price. Always ask about the "specials" they're offering when ordering. Alot of times a large menu pizza can be had for under $10 and sometimes even come with a free side (cheese bread,cookie dough, etc.). All in all, Papa Murphy's offers gourmet "take and bake" pizza without that gourmet price.

resp.text: Thank you for the kind words!

name: starlon2u
text: Fresh ingredients, helpful, kind staff. Will go back.

resp.text: Thank you for your business!

text: This is definitely my favorite place to get pizza. I don't know who does the hiring there or where they find them  but they've put together one heck of a team, it's not very often these that you find a group  of young folks that days that you find young folks that will do what needs to be done on third own and not grumble and gripe about it. Thanks Scottie for the excellent pizza, Lol I actually should have gotten 2 of them my guys had that one gone before I could blink! Keep up the good work and I'll be seeing y'all soon!!!

text: Friendly staff and the Chicken Garlic pizza is awesome!!

name: Jamie Wells
text: Great place and on of the only safe places to eat in Hartselle

name: Steven Whitworth
text: Very good pizza, and very low prices. I would definitely recommend them.

name: Jamie Wells
text: This is the only pizza place you can go in town that will not botch your order

name: Glenda Baugher
text: Good pizza

name: kyle henson
text: Pizza here is always the bomb

name: Heather Richards
text: Staff friendly but young.

name: Marquita Holt
text: Just the best

name: Delinda Meherg
text: Not a fan of Papa Murphy's.

name: Julie Overton
text: I made a large order and expected better food. One pizza was so dry it tasted like stale crackers. Two of my pizzas barely had sauce on them, and one pizza had NONE! The garlic parmesan wings were fine as plain wings because sauce was just barely drizzled on them. When I tried to speak to the shift manager about the issue, she was rude and treated me as though I was making it all up to receive free food. I did not ask for a refund. I just asked that it be made right. I drove 20 miles to order and pick up food from this location and I will not be going back. This is the worst experience I've ever had with a Domino's.

name: Rebeckah Faye
text: So last night we ordered, and things got a little mixed up and our order was a late. They were super busy, it was a Friday night,  phone steady ringing. Well the manager on duty ((i didn't catch his name)) lovely gentleman, went above and beyond to fix the mistake that was made. I was so mad when I went in and bless his heart he caught an earful, but when I say he handled it with ease and grace. Baby he did WONDERFUL. Kudos to you sir. I know this store has much growing to do but they are lucky to have a boss man like you!!

name: Brad Seal
text: The food is awesome!  Pizza is good but the wings are great, even better!  They're a real life save because it's literally the only place in town that delivers and like many others I'm working from home and can't find time to get much shopping done.  Thanks to Dominoes for coming and saving our town :D

name: Alisa Gill
text: I would give them zero stars if possible. 1st I tried placing an order that should have been $18.99 + tax. It came to $24.50 + tax. Finally got that corrected and when it said my order was ready they told me 5 more mins. Then after that I was told a delivery driver took my pizza. After agreeing to make another one I get a phone call stating that I have to take the one that the driver took. Nope!!

name: Desirea Jenkins
text: Love this place!!! As a food industry worker myself, I commend these folks on doing such a great job. Theyve blessed us at huddle house with free food. Anyone who does that is a winner in my eyes 😍

name: Big Country
text: This is the second time I've ordered delivery from here and my wife agrees that the service was excellent, the pizzas were exactly what we order and cooked perfectly, delivery drive was quick and followed the contact less delivery instructions to the tee. So keep up the good work guys, and don't let these other reviews get to you.

name: Luke Hostwaters
text: I was placing my order over the phone, as the girl goes to repeat my order back to me and tells me my total, she giggled. I got very frustrated because of the situation. I asked was something wrong and she said no im trying to find you a coupon so you don’t have to pay 50 dollars. This made me laugh after my long day of work, the little things people do or say make a difference, and most workers do not realize that. thanks kyla. i did not really catch the name so i tried my best. amazing food, my lava cakes were the best. i definitely plan on being back!

name: Courtney Brown
text: Easy ordering online and carside drop off makes it simple and easy.

name: Jason Evans
text: Would give 0 stars if I could. My order was wrong on this visit and the one before.  They did offer to fix it but driving 30 mins back to the store wasn't worth it.  Little Ceasar's is better never had an issue with them. Won't be back to Hamilton Alabama Dominos.

name: Benji Rider
text: Dude... Asked for the buffalo chicken bites and they sent plain chicken w a cup of buffalo sauce. They even called to confirm my order and was still incorrect. Then tried to charge me a second delivery charge to fix it, and told me to tip the driver again. When I got the correct chicken there was about a drop of buffalo sauce on each. Worst Dominos ever.

name: Lisa Walker
text: Well if I could have went lower i would have. It would have been nice to get a warm pizza, that wasn't hard a a brick

name: andrea loden
text: Seriously disappointed, myself the pizza is subpar to say the least and what they call csr Incompetent. Who does not understand what “ my order is wrong “ , means.? And then, their representative starts giggling while on the phone with you saying but I don’t understand “ what do mean it wasn’t right ? Please for the Love of god don’t release them if they’re not trained.... in phone etiquette and basic communication skills. It’s frustrating for people who are trusting you with their food.

name: Amber Luker
text: The food is great but the delivery person  was very rude

name: Donna Harris
text:
My 2 pizzas were overcooked and had hardly any cheese
I will think twice before ordering sgain

name: Ophie May
text: Dominos in Hamilton is a joke. I've been on the phone for half an hour just trying to get my pasta fixed, but ya know.. they don't answer.. I ordered a chicken alfredo and recieved this very dry pasta, the alfredo sauce is nonexistent.

name: Sabrina Brents
text: My order was 45 minutes late. I went thru the drive-thru and was told to make another lap since my pizza was in the oven.  I said how about I just pull over and park and someone brings it out.  The man at the window said ok. Keep in mind the car that was in front of us in the drive thru sat at the window for 15 minutes before we pulled up and we were told to make another lap. I waited another 20 minutes and finally just went in and got it. Also the car that was behind us was still at the window when i went in to get the pizza.. The food was ice cold.

name: Joe Shmitty
text: The food is good. The first few days were a little rocky with limited staff and high amounts of orders but after the first week I see an improvement in service.

name: Elijah Mayhorn
text: The food is great and service has drastically improved

name: Ken Murray
text: What a joke this Domino's is. Can't even get an order right and quality of service is slim to none.

name: sherry credille
text: I only gave it one star just so I can say this I was on the phone for over an hour to place an order no one answered the phone. My son tried for 45 minutes. What's up with this dominos

name: Laith Dawoud
text: I work here!! We love the city of Hamilton, and it’s a pleasure to be here!! DOMINOS PIZZA!!

name: Teela Holley
text: I work here and I love it great people

name: Kaden Blaine Whitaker
text: ye not the best but itll do

name: Emma
text: none of the food is ours and we paid 100 for it.

name: Thomas Robertson
text: Great food and service

name: Donny Harden
text: Good food and good service

name: Robert Shelton
text: 14 dollar minimum order

name: Jeff Holloway
text: putrid.

name: Courtney Shevchenko
text: The pizza was amazing, and arrived hot and fresh to my door. The delivery driver was so absolutely sweet and kind too! I will definitely order from here again.

name: Faye Day
text:
Last night, Saturday June 5, 2021; I used my Uber Eats to get Papa John’s Large Works Pizza add Garlic Sauce to the crust with no black olives and extra onions. Plus, I ordered the 6 piece Chipotle wings with Blue cheese and they were soooooo Good. My Pizza was the $14.99 special and the crust was so good, crispy, tasty and meat along with the vegetables were all fresh.  I tell you I almost ate it all.

But, I stopped myself. I’ve got 2 wings left and 4 slices of pizza. I give it all 4 ⭐️‘S. I give the cook 5 stars and the driver too because it didn’t take 80 minutes to get to me and my food was prepared with perfection.  I’m very happy with my food and the service that I receive from Papa John’s. Just take a look at the pictures.

Also, I really am pleased with the way that they secure your food with the sealed down tape on the containers and the drivers are completely cover to ensure your food is safe and you. 10 points for that.

name: LM W.
text:
*****Updated Experience Alert - Visit Today

Let me just say Papa John’s Calera came through in a clutch (in my 16 year old sons words).  I just say they saved the day!

Pros
- Easy to order online.
- I called to make sure that our wings were well done.  The young lady who answered was very energetic, enthusiastic and eager to assist.
- Conveniently located near my home.
- Fresh Ingredients - Delicious Food.
- Pipping Hot (We showered before we ate because we had been at the hospital all morning) Food was still hot, no microwave needed
- Fast Service (Online or At the Window)
- Family Special Offer under “Specials” online only $24.99 for two Large pizzas.

Papa John’s Calera you hit this visit out of the park.  Exceptional Job!

Cons
N/A

name: J. PCRun
text:
I just moved to this area, I'm accustomed to ordering ubereats though its not available 24/7 here.
But this Sunday I called at 7:30pm to place a delivery order, the young lady who answers most of the time when I do carryout answered and took my order. She mentioned  it would be about an hour and a half to an hour an fourth five mins. I said thats fine, now its 10:08 no call no delivery?
I knew better than to say I would be paying with cash than credit. But I did anyway. SMH
I was planning  to tip the driver nearly 90% of my order total. I knew it was late an I have manged  restaurants  before. Which is the reason ,even when I pick up my order ,I tip. I've Only ordered, maybe five times,  each time I said keep the change. I just want you all to know that this is not right and certainly not the proper  way to run a business. At least have the decency to give me a call and say "hey we don't have any drivers available at the moment". I live 5 minsaway i would have drove there.

name: Michael Vanhook
text: We really enjoyed our pizza and Cheese Sticks. It was all well cooked. They did really well considering they are new to the area and a welcomed selection. I'm sorry that other reviews gave poor remarks. Most pizza is made by hand 🙂 and hand tossed crust is delicious. ✋

name: Justin Maddox
text: Brand new spot. Good food. More convenient than having to go to the Alabaster location and I quit going to the Calera Pizza Hut a long time ago.

name: Toni McKenzie
text: Ordered pizza ahead on a holiday, paid for it and was told it would be delivered on time. Called when the pizza was late. I was rudely told by one of the immature employees that their system did not drop my order and it would be 3 hours to get my order because my call ahead order had zero priority. When I asked for their managers name I was told phoney names and I was hung up on. I called back and the "so called manager" was even more rude than the first person I spoke with and I was hung up on again. I called the GM the following morning only to be met with rude behavior again and was called liar. The kids who worked there said I cussed them out. That was a lie. I called another Papa Johns location whom told me that the call ahead orders are priority over all other orders and that they lied because they simply just didn't do their job. They also said people complain about their service at the Calera location al the time, and they were ashamed of this location having their store logo treating customers this way. Do business at your own risk with them. Poor service and poor accountability.

name: Zaquia Taylor
text: Super slow service, bunch of kids working with poor supervision. I witnessed employees actually dropping pizzas (remaking them) but laughing about it. I understand being young, but this is a place of business. I waited about an hour for my order.

name: Devin Jeffreys
text: Very slow, constantly out of one thing or another. Wanted mediums, they tell me they’re out but then I’m forced to may more for larger pizzas, that I didn’t even need/ want. Poor supervision of teenage employees. Really stinks bc I was looking forward to this location opening up. Hopefully it changes soon

name: Jerry Riggins
text:
I was really looking forward to enjoying a Papadia from the new Calera Papa John’s...  I tried twice to place the order online, but the order would not process or confirm. I then tried to call the store on twice to place an order by phone, And was immediately put on hold both times. After waiting on hold for 10 minutes per call, I finally gave up trying to order.  During the 25 to 30 minutes I spent trying to place my order, I could have driven to Dominos and Montevallo and picked up something just as good there. I understand things can be busy at times, but having this much trouble placing an order is ridiculous...

Update: I really wanted a Papadia... I drove to the store and ordered in person.  It was delicious!  If they can get the bugs out of placing orders, then I will be back.

name: Dewayne Williams
text: Called in a to go order was told it will be 45 minutes to an hour because they were busy. Not a problem showed up at the drive thru window an hour and 15 minutes later took someone 10 minutes to come to the window just to tell me we can’t find your order. I’ll call Pizza Hut from now on

name: John Rosales
text: This is the worst pizza i have eating from papa johns. Employees not wearing gloves.  I ask for extra cheese extra pepperoni didnt get it.  Customer service is poor.. will never order again rather go with pizza Hutt

name: Mel C
text: The pizza was delicious, hot, and quick. Wouldn’t expect anything different from Papa John’s.

name: Haley Erin
text: Great food great people

name: Devin Ellzey
text: That pizza slap simple.

name: Jonathan Welsh
text: We get delivery from them all the time. The food is always great and is always nice and neat! (I dont like a sloppy pizza lol) for some reason i have not done a review for them yet so here it is. Get your pizza at this location its great.

name: Tim Camp
text:
Ordered delivery, Was told 25 to 30 minutes, ok fine.
Started calling after an hour...
One hour and forty five minutes later I'm still being told it's on it's way.
Let me be clear It's five minute from Papa Johns to my house.
Two hours after ordering it finally arrives.
No discount, No apology, Just two hour old pizza.
NEVER AGAIN

name: Dorothy Richardson
text: The worker were very polite and professional.

name: Jess Wright
text: Can you guys please work on not burning the heck out of your gluten free pizza to the point of it being inedible￼? I am understanding to the fact cooking or baking with gluten free products or dough is difficult at times because, it cooks differently compared to traditional dough.... I literally couldn’t consume a majority of this pizza though. ￼I am usually not one to complain but, this has happened multiple times. I mean it cost as much as a large traditional pizza 16.99 (which I don’t mind) but, could you at least just make it not taste like charred food that you just scraped out of your oven. ￼

resp.text: We're sorry to hear your pizzas have been overcooked, Jess. Can you please provide the email associated with the account, order number, and contact information at reviews@papajohns.com.

name: King Champion Entrepreneur Ratheal
text: This location is awesome,  I used them while campaigning for office and to feed my employees.  Fresh and always accurate orders, great leadership!

name: Janet Hinton
text: Too slow in delivering...over 2 1/2 hours is too much, plus they already have your money. 😡

name: Christa Kuppersmith
text: Don’t use this location. The last 3 times we have ordered pizza it has taken at least an hour and half to get to us. The pizza is fine but they are super slow. Two of the 3 times we had people over for and it is not a good thing to have to tell your guests you can’t feed them.

name: Tiffany Betcher
text: Tried to hit me for 80 bucks for 2 for 12 sandwiches.. manager had no explanation... no food, waiting on refund... seriously..be about your *franchise* or gtf on... sincerely, paying customer

name: Ryan Davis
text: The store was a mess, most workers were not wearing masks, one of the cooks was eating, and the pizza was undercooked

name: S B
text: Food was good, especially the stuffed crust.

name: Les Duffield
text: Ordered at 130pm. Told me 30 to 45 minutes.  An hour and a half later, my girl and I, both pretty hungry, decided to call and check our order.  Her being a former pizza chain manager, we understand it could be running late.  But nope. Not late, delivered to the wrong address.

name: cross nic
text: Slam busy but still hauling. Thank you! Keep it up fellas.

resp.text: That's what we like to hear! Thank you very much!

name: Kenneth Justice
text: Excellent food,service,and wait time.

name: Simon Waldrop
text: After waiting 2 hours, and the tracker stating the pizzas were on the way for 45 minutes, the order was cancelled. No call, no email. Claimed they couldn't find the residence though we have ordered before. Very poor effort in service.

resp.text: We're sorry to hear this, Simon. Can you please provide the email associated with the account, order number, and contact information at reviews@papajohns.com.

name: avmy young
text: Papa John's pizza is great for people who don't like a lot of toppings on their pizza and hardly any grease and/or butter. I love buttery, greasy, thick pizza so it's not for me so i give the pizza  2 stars but my mom who's not a pizza lover would give the pizza 4 stars. For the staff i would give an additional 2 stars, they seem pretty cool and were pretty nice people when I went to go pick up my order.

name: rickey slayton
text: Tried to get pizza delivered downtown on a NON Parade day. Was told they couldn't deliver because of the parade. Then argued with me saying they know when the parades are... but I work downtown on a parade route so I think I know as well.

name: Sheria Johnson
text: After staying on hold for 20 minutes I finally place my order. When I get to Papa John's to pick it up they can't find where I made so still no pizza.

resp.text: Oh no, Sheria!  We're very sorry to hear this happened with your recent order.  Please email us at reviews@papajohns.com, so we can help make this right.  Thank you.

name: mary bowab
text: Ordered pizza to be delivered. They said it was going to take 119 mins to deliver the pizza (first off that’s waayyy too long). Later, 119 minutes pass and Papa Johns cancels the order. They said they called but a phone call was never received 0/5. 👎🏻

resp.text:
We are sorry to hear about this! We want to make this right for you!
Can you please email your order number/information and contact information to reviews@papajohns.com.

name: DLB B
text: A $35.00  order from here once a week. Made a order today and didnt get any sauce for any of the 3 items. Just a pepper and requested 2 different types. Called them and they seemed not to care about there regular customers. Ill never order again.

name: Patricia Pritchard
text: The new fold over pizzas were very good, they will be a big success for only 6.00.

name: Stanley Carr
text: Not a good experience due to the driver.  We are visiting here and attending a 10 day church event. We ordered two pizzas, wings and a two liter drink. The delivery drivers calls us to meet her in the lobby. I let her know my daughter would come down and what she was wearing. Once my daughter got to the front desk she call me to ask where was the driver. At the same time the driver calls back and says no one is at the desk waiting. When I asked the driver where was she at , first she said that she was waiting at the desk and didn't see anyone there with what I told her my daughter was wearing. I asked if she was sure she was at the desk because my daughter was on the other line waiting at the desk. That's when she told me no , she was outside because she had to go get her phone. First untruth. My daughter calls back and ask if we ordered a drink because the driver didn't give her one. I quickly call called the driver back so she didn't get to far and have to turn around. Once I got in touch with her to inform her that she had forgot to give us our drink , she states that she was looking at our ticket and we didn't order a drink. Once again I asked if she was sure? She replies that she was. Second untruth. I guess she forgot how a copy of the order is on each box, and how it clearly reads a 2 liter mountain dew. That's not the funny part. When my wife called the store back guess who answers the phone . That's right the same person who took our order, who happens to be the manager. The manager said confirmed that we did order the drink and sent the driver back. Now you know this untrustworthy driver's attitude was beyond bad, having to come back after the untruths.

name: Diamond Aries
text:
They do a great job, they work super fast and hard.  The reason for three stars, they won't deliver to my address, or a lot of others. Sometimes, if you put an order online, they will call back and cancel because of this. This is an inconvenience, especially when I've already paid n was expecting pizza....
Other than that, this place is great if you're in their delivery area or can come get your own food.

name: Ciara Hudson
text: I like the kind of pizza that they be having

resp.text: We are glad to hear you enjoy the pizza, Ciara! Thank you for the positive review. Have a great day!

name: Kaquandria Johnson
text: Papa John pizza was a very great experience for my son and I...The employees was very mannerable...The manager and the employees acknowledged my son birthday and helped me made his day special....I would most DEFINITELY recommend Papa John Pizza...

name: Rose Davis
text: Food is great ...but check your options from other locations ...the phone person maynot be informed on their specials/ deals

name: Cheryl West
text: Good pizza pizza always hot upon delivery

name: Monica Duff
text: Papa John's is my favorite pizza place

resp.text:
Hello Monica,
Thank you for the wonderful review!

name: Danielle S
text: Best papa Johns experience ive had in a while... the front desk guy was so pure and friendly I really appreciated him. I don’t know his name. He was working at 8 pm on the 28th

name: Monica Duff
text: Papa John's is my favorite pizza place

resp.text:
Hello Monica,
Thank you for the wonderful review!

name: j c
text: Pizza is always good. They will not let you edit your order or add anything if you forget something online. Apparently the technology to edit online orders is too advanced for Papa John's.

name: Neil Cater
text:
Papa John's:
Me:Yeah, I'd like to place an order for carryout
Papa John's: *silence for 30 seconds*
Me: Hello? I'd like to place an order for carryout?
Papa John's: Yeah, I heards ya tha first time.

Wth? I wasn't rude! I'll just call your competitor.

name: Stella Delorean
text: The website never works, so you gotta call the store. They don't honor website deals, nor have I gotten an order that was correct. When I asked to have a manager contact me, all I got was an automated response.  After calling the number that was given to me by an employee,  I hung up after ten minutes.  Ordering a pizza shouldn't be this ridiculous.

name: Wayne Allen
text: I have eaten papa John's Pizza for year's,I know for a fact that it is a great Pizza to eat

name: pam wood
text: Not the best Papa John's but order was right and pizza was good.

name: Olympia jackson
text: I love there pizza and That garlic sauce is great

name: Lisa Ephriam
text: Ordered a pizza with the works, the dough was not completely cooked.

name: James Soleyn
text: Pizza too small to be a large. Sam's got you beat.

name: Joe Kilpatrick
text: I hate to say I wasn't impressed, for the price we paid we could have got a couple Domino's Pizza's which I believe are way better. However sometimes it is nice to have Papa John's but I don't think that we will be back

name: David Roy
text: Great food, usually quickly made and fast service.

name: Kary Castillo
text: food was good but the restrooms were disgusting please clean them and the door hits you on the way in and out

name: Dede
text: Fast service and wonderful food.

name: Just The 2 Of Us
text: Love there pizza....but slow

name: Sharon Wright
text: The pizza is excellent they can cook a good pizza

name: blues Miller
text: Papa johs be tripping when it comes to those green peppers, 1 pepper is not enough for 4 people

name: Ashley Jay
text: To go order love the sauce

name: Hugo D
text: Good pizza for the prize

name: bob e. anderson
text: Friendly staff serving quality pizza.

name: Meeka M.
text: Score is a 75 and when asked no one could tell me why #disgusting I turned around and left

name: jmua04
text: I give everyone a second chance. Their second chance is up. Slow, incompetent and clueless. Just make your own pizza because unfortunately everyone in mobile who works in the Pizza business is a dolt.

name: Donzetta Crum
text: The BEST pan pizza... EVER!

name: Elijah Blanks
text: Great pizza

name: JM
text: Hit or miss

name: Nelly Dunn
text: Good

name: Jovan Harris
text: Love the pizza

name: nina williams
text: Good hot pizza

name: Shaishai Webb
text: Delicious

name: Karen Copeland
text: Every time I come here I get friendly service.. Their breakfast is very good! I would recommend this to everyone who like some good cooking!

name: Jayboogie FoefoeAte
text: Over cooked, cold food, workers slow

name: Denise Boswell
text: Loved the Southern Style Cooking!! But I was not happy about my $6 fish special. The fish was amazing!! But the fries were completely raw!! Not cooked. The young lady preparing my order went to the back to get my fries should have noticed that they were not cooked properly. I didn't mind waiting for my fries to cook. Other than that... Everything was GREAT!!

name: Mattie Brown
text: The Food At This Restaurant Store Is So Delicious...I Come All The Way From Georgia Jus To Get Me 2 plates Especially The Oxtails,Pig Feets, Ham hocks,meat loaf, Etc.

name: Joakin MORI
text: Do not be deceived by the menu. No oxtail whatsoever.

name: Zandra Walker
text: Food is delicious down home southern cuisine! Amazing

name: Felix Huang
text: This out-of-the way convenience store actually has some of the best barbecue you'll find anywhere. I try to stop by here whenever I'm in the area.

name: Jameelah Brown
text: Great food, love this place

name: Yologsolive Kennedy
text: I like going here for a quick bite to eat when I’m not cooking. It sometimes seems like they are cutting back on ingredients.Sometimes the pizza look great but what can you ask for for $5 and I still like it here.

name: Justice For All
text: You can't beat a pepperoni pizza for $5 it's always very good hot and fresh. Pizza Pizza

name: N. Hope
text: My husband and I have ordered from here via the app at least 3 times over the past year. The employees have always been nice and the store has been clean. We have always gotten exactly what we ordered and it was always warm. Using the app allows us to avoid any wait time as well, so I would recommend using it if you are not willing to wait.

name: doc lamb
text: Very good fresh and hot supreme and pepperoni cheezer cheezer.

name: Ricky Harmon
text: The Little Caesars in Columbiana is a solid franchise. They always deliver what you expect and the service is good.

name: Charles Reach (AssassinPLAZ Gaming)
text: My grandson  ate all of his pizza and said it was very good. He got him the pepperoni and cheese with extra cheese

name: Susan Sanford
text: Usually I am very happy with the pizzas this time I was not so much I got a extra most bestest pepperoni and it had about a 2in crust all the way around the pizza with no sauce or pepperoni or anything on it and usually with the extra most bestest the pepperoni goes all the way to the edge. I don't mind a small crust but that was ridiculous. I will go back but hopefully this will not happen again

name: Jonathon Stokes
text: Was very good and fast just wish they had more hot n ready

name: Kimberly Casey
text: Service, price and quality of food was great!

name: Renee Cox
text: Good service and good pizza!

name: Jenny Cotney
text: The pizza was good, but they tried to charge me a dollar extra for my pizza when the sign clearly says $8 deep dish pepperoni pizza.  When I questioned the girl, she told me cheese was  $8. Wrong.  Sign (and their commercials) state $8. Not sure what's up with this location. I never have problems at other locations.

name: Steven Woods
text: Greay food well prepared.

name: Norman Montag
text: The meals and service were beyond my expectations. We truly loved the vibes of this place. Great place to take the family out for lunch.

name: Leonard Smith
text: Very slow service. Not sure, but the car before me must have had a custom order. I finally found a place to park and went inside. Had only 2 pepperoni pizzas ready to go and nothing else. Pleasant enough, but Pizza Hut is better, faster, and easier to get in and out of. Not likely to return.

name: larry sevinsky
text: Fast and easy

name: Ashley Storey
text: Awesome customer service! I legit pulled up to the drive thru at 11:01 ( they open at 11:00 ) and at 11:03 I was handed my perfectly made & delicious Pepperoni 🍕 pizza & two cheesy breads! I am definitely one satisfied customer & will be returning! 👍🏼👍🏼🍕🤤✅

name: Amy Gravlee
text: The staff is always so friendly!

name: Dwayne “Da'Wayniacc” Roberts
text: Good pizza. Not as fast as I'd like but still hot and good. If I gotta wait a lil bit for a freshly mafe product I'm fine with that.

name: Seabeastie20000
text: Cheapest pizza you can possibly get with little to no wait time. Quality is pretty low, but not the worst pizza I've ever had.

name: David Fadule
text: This is literally one of my top favorite pizza spots. However, sometimes I order Italian Cheese Bread and I get a doughy Mess. I have to take it home and bake it for a while to cook it. I have left a review and they seem to ignore my messages.

name: Cheri' Rush
text: Service was famazing but didn't like.my pizza

name: Brandon Stone
text: I've never had a bad experience here. The pizza is always Hot N Ready like promised. We even order our own on the app from time to time.

name: venus9 Cotton
text: Best customer service but the pizzas is expensive if you're taking a to go and the pizzas is really small in the box

name: Jackie Wade Montgomery
text: The pizza is always hot . the employees are nice and they do a good job.

name: Louis “ig: Ceo_of_Low” Steverson
text: Always decent!

name: Tam Kay
text: Been here a few times and every time is horrible. I’ve waited for 15+ min for someone to come to the window (one time I waited for 30 min and was never greeted at the window or the inside so I just left) and it takes 30+ min to get 2 pizzas. Call and they don’t answer or they answer and hang up in your face. Go to the lil Caesars in Calera. They are awesome.

name: Jodi Morris
text: Everytime I've went to this Little Ceasars they have messed my order up. If it's not messed up it's not cooked all the way! Dont bother calling in a order because you will wait just as long as if you ordered it on the spot. Dont ask for your order to be fixed because they will just roll their eyes and give you attitude. Worse place ever!

name: the country millwright
text: It's fast and it's cheap but the employees seem to have an attitude I wouldn't be happy to work there either but you are a professional and are being paid to act lime it

name: Angel Corns
text: Entire experience was horrible. I ordered from work so it be ready when I arrived. Got to drive thru [waited 12 min] told i had to come inside. Ok fine. Park go inside waited 10 min said I had to pick up from kiosk. Ok I never got a code sent to me. The lady was rude and hateful because I didnt have this code. I just wanted a quick meal to feed my family. After much debate she finally found a code. I got my horribly cold pizza and no sauce that i ordered. So. I will from now on drive on into Camera. Will not ever go back to this location. The red head lady working needs customer service skills and retraining.

name: jason hunt
text: This place is so slow, it took 10 mins of waiting for them to take my order and i was the only one in line.. then another 10 for my pizza! Crazy for a place like this. Staff was not rude but wasn't very polite either. (I ordered the deep deep dish pizza btw).

name: Stacey Misso
text: Great food. Always fresh and ready.

name: CiCi Cathi Tinney
text: Slow. Great pizza

name: Calvin Branch
text: Will no longer be coming here for pizza. Most of the staff is rude and impatient. Pizzas are always cut unevenly. They act like you're always bothering them and the staff is always arguing with each other.

name: daniel chesser
text: Ordered 3 thin crusts with extra cheese and pepperoni. Paid $10 a piece. That wasn’t extra pepperoni or cheese. Went back in and they said it was in fact extra. Very dissatisfied. Should’ve gone to a mom and pop pizza place.

Between the false advertising and never having dipping sauces i.e. gaflic butter, id would rather drive to calera for pizza hut or get a frozen one and cook it myself.

name: Denese Luck
text: Although everyone was extremely nice and the food is delicious I need napkins when I eat. Can never get any from Domino's. Paper napkins is the same as a paper box when it comes to germs(covid). Ridiculous!

name: Mellissa Harris
text: The system was down online so I had to call the store. No one answered and I called four times. When I arrived at the store their were at least 6 employees there.  I informed thetge worker and she didn't seem to care. This dominos location on gateway has really gone down and the only reason I went was for my uncle. Service is poor and they usually get my order wrong that's why I've stopped eating at this location. They really need a better manager. And an employee also drop a customers sauces while delivering curbside and didn't pick them up. Just very unprofessional location and very lazy.

name: Michael Rizzuto
text: Got a phone call minutes after placing my order to inform me that their hours had changed and they no longer delivered to the address for the hotel I was staying at. They need to updated their website to reflect this. I understand they are low staffed but she said until the end of summer the hours had changed. Need to fix that so other travelers aren’t wasting their time.

name: Drew Hill
text: Overall good. I would suggest sticking with the hand tossed pizzas. Tried the pan and got the extravaganza, basically the supreme with everything and it turned out really doughy like it needed a few more minutes in the oven. This is typical when there's that many toppings, but was still a bit disappointed. Ended up finishing it myself in the oven at home.

name: cowanization
text: Quick, hot, and fresh!! Thank you for delivering to a trucker 😎🚛

name: Brandon Holt
text: The pizza is good but it's a little pricey when you can go get it somewhere else cheaper but a if you want better Pizza you pay the money

name: GERALD PLOTT
text: Phone rang for over 10 minutes, got there and they said they dont answer the phone. Papa Johns's had no problem taking my order. They should just close it down.

name: Chris Ferguson
text: Placed order and they took my money. Then tell me we can’t put in ur order and it’ll be 3 to 5 days before u get ur money back.  Bs I bet I want use them again!!!

name: Triniti Evans
text: I did not get garlic butter on my bread knots!

name: Jessica Driggers
text:
First off, the female who answered the phone hung up on me when i asked her to hold on.  I understand not being able to hold,  but all she had to do was say that and not hang up on me.....because when i called back she then had me hold.

Then when i got to the store they couldn't break a $100 bill...when my bill was $40, so they claimed they didn't have $60 worth if change in the drawer..... frightfully inconvenient....and the female at the counter told me to 'just go to the gas station and get change'.....so much for customer service....

We WILL NOT be going back to this location.... there are much nicer, friendlier, more customer-centric locations with the same area.

AND, don't order cheese bread and expect any sauce, THE MANAGER said that 'every franchise does it differently'....I guess I misunderstood the concept of a franchise.

name: Johnathan Wealth
text: Ordered at 8:30pm still haven’t gotten my order and it’s 10:27pm now called 5 times no answer

name: Ellie Miller
text: the last four times i’ve called i was on hold for ever and when they finally picked up the phone they hung up on me immediately.

name: Kimberly Patrick
text: Order online. Order was cancelled because no driver and they said they called 3x but I only go 1 call...and couldn’t confirm refund...bad service

name: Judy King
text: I asked what they had for special i was told larg specialty for 14.99 told the guy that i wanted that then said i wanted a med pepperoni. When it was delivered i got hust the med pepperoni. When i called back the guy who i placed my order with when i told him that i was to have 2 pizzas one was a larg specialty an med pepperoni he said i didnt specify what specialty i wanted i thought a specialty was with everthing one it futher more he didnt even bother to even ask me what specialty i wanted. I guess nectime inorder i guess ill go to all the way to auburn to pizza hut cause when you ask for specialty they give you all the way on it unless younask for meat lovers or a supreme pizza. I guess thats what i get for not realy asking down to the details what their specialty means. Your people who answers phone needs to learn how to place an ask your guest what they want on pizzas cause they just cost you money. Cause i dont like to go all the way to auburn to get pizza when i can have it delivered but not any more for a person who dont like the auburn trafic guess i will have to fight it next time for a pizza. Thank you for your hospitality an for not trying to make things right with you customer.

name: DL Copeland
text: I'm a Delivery Expert here, fast, friendly an great customer service.

name: Catherine Wilson
text: Please an order before closing my order was canceled because they didn’t feel like fixing/delivering the order called next day manager was very rude stated he wasn’t there add they had there reasons I thought that was so unprofessional

name: elizabeth konegan
text: I have had them deliver to my house for the last 9 years and all of a sudden they don't deliver out here . You will not get any of my business anymore .

name: Jessie Hodges
text: My daughter came and picked up a pepperoni pizza and cinnionmon twist.. I am very displeased with both.. They were burnt and very tough to eat.. I don't think I will be coming back...

name: Jessie Hodges
text: My daughter came and picked up a pepperoni pizza and cinnionmon twist.. I am very displeased with both.. They were burnt and very tough to eat.. I don't think I will be coming back...

name: Kristina Wilkes
text: If I could give zero stars I would. This place is run poorly. They are always understaffed. I placed an order for delivery and they called me 15 minutes later (when the delivery quote was 22 minutes) to inform me that they could not deliver my pizza but I could come pick it up for the SAME PRICE even though the delivery fee is 3.99 and I tipped the driver 20%. The manager was useless. I don’t even blame the staff there, seems like it stems from corporate. Absolutely awful.

name: Staci Cannon
text: My pizza was burnt and it was a hot mess. I wont never spend a dime with them

name: Muffinman Wolfe
text: Dude, this dominos was operating with one manager and one delivery guy on a Thursday night! Constant phone calls, rushing back and forth, the delivery guy helping make pizzas and taking four to five deliveries out while we were there, I mean these two guy were killing it! Absolute badasses and deserve some praise!

name: Tammy Stafford-Bellflower
text: Ordered, through the app, a large Brooklyn MeatZZa pizza a few minutes past 5: pm, and the alert came up a few minutes later saying it was ready. I live 40 minutes away, and I get home, open up the box, and no meat; just plain cheese pizza. I called and was told they would do another one...and plus one, for free, and that it would be ready by the time I arrive. I go in to pick up and both orders are wrong, again. I had to wait 15 minutes for them to redo the orders. It ended up being 2 1/2 hours before me and my family finally got to eat.

name: Kesia Drake
text: Been on hold for a hour every time I call😡😡😡

name: Shelia Hoyett
text: I ordered my items online... I did not get them until way too late..it was not hot. They knew the service was terrible because they immediately gave me a 20% coupon off of my next order.( I didn’t even speak to anyone about my order nor did I leave a review).. so they knew it was terrible service...so fast forward to today I ordered my items online and when I got them they were not hot... I was trying to track my order.. and couldn’t so I called the store and was told the GPS system was down. I don’t know what is going on but being that I live only 2 minutes away I would think my food would be much better than I have been getting considering I include a “suggested”  tip every time .. my first order was under $20 but the next day my order was over $50 and it still was the same thing... Luke warm pizza and desserts!!!!! Very disappointed!!!!

name: Kristine Rogers
text: They made our pizzas exactly the way we asked them to.

name: duke likins
text: employees are awesome

name: Savannah Ellsworth
text:
UPDATE: I changed my review because after getting in touch with HQ the manager called to formally apologize and take care of it, which I really appreciated. Hoping for better experiences from here on.
I never order from Domino's and always get papa johns. I decided I wanted a drink and they have sprite so I ordered from there today. The driver brought the wrong drink and was gone before I notice so I called the store. Whoever answered the phone said do you want us to have the driver bring you another one. I said yes because that's what I ordered and she said I don't even know how long it'll be and then hung up without even asking where I live or anything. Took a chance and will not be ordering here again. Talk to the staff about some manners. I work in the food service too. (Still waiting on soda to be here. Who know if it'll come)

name: Savannah Ellsworth
text:
UPDATE: I changed my review because after getting in touch with HQ the manager called to formally apologize and take care of it, which I really appreciated. Hoping for better experiences from here on.

name: Joleen Pulkinen
text: So why don't you deliver to the Golden Cherry hotel? They waited till after my pizza out of oven before calling me. I don't have a car so I can't pick it up. Seriously?!

name: zjp1995
text: I normally never have issues with this particular location but I placed an order online. I got to the place checked my pizza out and it was burnt around the crust and it also had very little cheese on it with bubbles. I asked the young lady that rung me up to remake the pizza and she was very nice about it and was about to remake the pizza with no problem! Although then the manager came around the corner and was making smart remarks. He said and I quote "order your pizza right the first time online". Now mind you I ordered the pizza correctly it was made poorly. He was very unprofessional and rude. Kuddos to the young lady though, she should take his position because he clearly doesn't know customer service. 3 stars  because management needs work.

name: Jennifer Clark
text:
The pizza was hot and ready when I arrived. However, it wasn't up to the quality I have come to expect from Domino's. The toppings became sparse before ending at the signature garlic crust edge. Our pizza was full of bubbles and actually had burnt portions. Our cutter may have been new because it was highly inconsistent. We had slices equal to 1 1/2-2 slices then baby slivers.

I was just passing through so I can't speak on if this was the typical quality or if we caught them on a bad night. My typical experience at other locations 500 miles from here are much better so hopefully this location was just training a newbie.

name: Justin Edwards
text: They never have enough drivers the food is always cold I wouldn’t recommend anybody to them 5 thumbs down

name: D Brown
text: I don't like to do negative reviews, but 2.00 frozen pizzas would have been better than what we paid over 30.00 for tonight!  it took an hour just to get the food out the door!!!  Apparently this store is poorly managed.  Worst pizzas I've ever had... one pizza had burnt bacon, very thin crust, overcooked, stale, and was very drrrrryyyy.  The other one was very dry, stale tasting, and the inside of the pizza was undercooked.  We ended up giving nearly all of it to the dog but she didnt even eat much of it, and she usually eats anything until she over stuffs herself and throws up and eats that too. She also enjoys trashcan food and cat poo.  She walked away from the pizza.  Only 8 minutes away, and it took almost an hour and a half to get 2 pizzas and 1 cheese bread.  And as if this wasn't  enough, we ordered marinara sauce, which was non existent with our meal.  The delivery person was very professional, kind, and punctual with the order.

name: Jennifer Washington
text: Pizza was great.

name: Mon Petit Chou
text: We had been very happy with their product for the most part. However, between our last pizza being burnt black and just receiving a phone call to inform us that our order would not be delivered for 2.5-3 hours(!), they have lost customers. We are not happy.

name: DJBreeze652
text: waited 2 hours for food to be delivered. their tracker definitely is broken online.

name: Brad Harwell
text: The service is beyond pathetic!  Run from this place!!!!!!! Completely horrible service!!!!

name: Brad Harwell
text: The service is beyond pathetic!  Run from this place!!!!!!! Completely horrible service!!!!

name: Anthony Chambers
text: The driver was on time. Very nice. And constantly kept a smile on her face. And very respectful. And the food is very good. My first time eating from this dominos pizza since I moved here and I'm very impressed. Thank you. You have my business.

name: Daunjulio 712
text: The pizza was very nasty and my pizza was mushed together when it got delivered

name: Bill Kendrick
text: Called for delivery on a Tuesday at 6 PM. Was told it would take an hour and 45 minutes. Decided to pick up. 2 people working with a delivery car in front and no customers inside. My order with one other was all that was in process. Had to use debit card because they did not have $22 for change. Good pizza awful service.

name: Nima S
text: I ordered the day before and called in the morning to make sure they will have it ready on time.. sure enough I had to wait 20 min to get my order.....no apologies nothing

name: windell caldwell
text: On date of 6/29/20: I order my pizza online @ 11:15p and my tracker said it’s been delivered and I never received my pizza so now I’m struck at work Hungry. So I called them I didn’t get no answer when I called three times.

name: Molly Nutt
text: Always delicious. Delivery is always prompt.! Never had a wrong order.

name: Eric Gooden
text: Ordered pizza and bread sticks and a pasta. No marinara with my cheese bread. Purchased for the 3rd time

name: TRAP 431
text: went to pick up pizza after getting a email stating it was ready . To no suprise i was told the pizza was not only not ready it was never made but if i could wait 20-30 minutes they would make it. Not the first time this happened

name: matt hammock
text: Cold burnt pizza unprofessional staff very disappointed for the money spent

name: James Bradberry
text: Friendly staff and way better than little caesars!

name: Brittany Stroud
text: I ordered online Sunday 11/11 right at 5pm. I ordered 5 pizzas and an order of cinnamon twists.  Unfortunately every last pizza was deformed.  Like a mix between thin crust and hand tossed.  (Supposed to be hand tossed)  and mass majority of the pizzas were black on the bottom.  Typically pizza is GREAT.. it's been a bit but Domino's fell short last night.  Cinnamon twist and customer service was just fine.  Was in and out no wait.

name: Oscar Fernandez
text: Everything was good.

name: 종현이
text: I really disappointed all bread and ingredients burned out!!!! I think they don’t know how to bake pizza..  It’s all burned totally burned too much over baked

name: Tanya Singh
text:
I know it's not that to give it just two stars since for the kind of quality food that they  provide and of course who doesn't love their pizzas. But one of my very first delivery experiences that I just had today.
It's not about the 50 cents or so that I paid for that Marinara Sauce but all that matters a lot is when you have it on waiting and no wonder they forget it. If I forgot to ask for it when getting my breadsticks and the pizza delivered, I think it's still majorly on their part wrong for not to provide it.
Sometimes even the slightest of the wrongs piss a lot. I tried to call them right back immediately and was told that they going up sending it right back but none showed up.
Must be wondering who comes back for just this much, right? I knew it too somewhere in my mind but didn't really know that they be lacking behind this low on customer satisfaction. I, myself deliver stuff at my other side job to my  Customers and I make sure everything is so pitch-perfect knowing that eeling of the customer excitedly waiting and having all their eyes on the person delivering it, because, "FOOD is love, FOOD is Happiness".

name: Pat Barnett
text: Love this place

name: Britt Thomas
text: I love building my own pizza,  & I can see what my pizza looks like when I had toppings to it.

name: Lura New
text: We order frequently from this store and so much so that we have earned a free pizza.  However, the pizza we got this evening was.  It was cold, and half of the crust was burned so that we couldn't eat it, and the other half was almost burned.  What a huge disappointment for $24.00!  We switched from Papa John's to Domino's months ago, but we never experienced this disaster!

name: Abigail Rose
text: After waiting an hour and a half for my pizza to be delivered I decided to call the store just to make sure the order actually got placed. The manager told me they only had one driver on that i would get mine soon (I got it about 30 minutes after this call). I understand the lack of staff BUT CALL ME AND LET ME KNOW WHATS GONIG ON. Also DON'T DELIVER MY PIZZA LUKE WARM AND DRIED UP FROM WAITING TO BE DELIVERED!!! Honestly even a apology from the manager or driver would have been nice.

name: Rodney Smith
text: Amazing pizza at an amazing price. Quick too! Best pizza deal in the area.

name: Lura New
text: We order frequently from this store and so much so that we have earned a free pizza.  However, the pizza we got this evening was. We switched from Papa John's to Domino's months ago, but we never experienced this disaster!

name: Rodney Smith
text: Amazing pizza at an amazing price. Quick too! Best pizza deal in the area.

name: L BW
text: Very good service. My first time here.

name: Jedonne Morton
text: Pizza took 45 minutes to go from store to our motel. So it was cold.  The brownie cookie dessert was burnt. Called to talk to manager and was hung up on. I was polite to the girl answering the phone, so there was no reason to do so. So I suggest finding somewhere else to get pizza.

name: Vanessa Holliday
text: good if you go pick up..... takes them 2hrs to deliver one pizza on a Sunday night

name: Bryan Gilmore
text: This is the third time that my pizza spent over 30 minutes at the restaurant done before it actually left the building.  Took months before I ordered again but they did it yet again.

name: Vicki Kilpatrick
text: Always prompt delivery. Pizza is great. Can't say enough good about this location Dominio's Pizza place!!!

name: Mark Lovelace
text: Very bad management.  I ordered a carryout special online, only to find out it wasn't ready when I got there after plenty of time.  Also, once it was ready I was informed there was a softball size hole in the middle and they would have to remake it.  Waited another 20 minutes on the re-bake only to be given the bread twist that were cold after sitting for 25 minutes.  I asked them why they didn't re-bake the twist as well only to receive bad attitude from the manager.  I will not order again from this store.

name: Ryan Johnson
text: Sweet bbq chicken burnt order a meats pizza with cheddar cheese and they put feta cheese nasty

name: Lily Hill
text: We ordered 2 LG pizzas, one Philly cheese steak and a half pepperoni n half cheese. When I called to see why it cost so much for 2 the lady said because I didn't ask about the specials ( which I didn't know you had to ask, I thought they would tell you) we learned n not sure we'll go back.

name: Teddy Dinkins
text: The pizza was not made the way I instructed and if it wasn't for the fact I had a house of 12 year olds I would've waited to have them remade. Not good Opelika domino's!!!!

name: Lily Hill

text: Usually I never have a problem. Tonight The order says complete and I’ve been waiting for 30 min and no one will answer the phone. Terrible service.

name: donna swann
text: Great

name: Brittany Nicole
text: Placed my order at 10:30 got it at 1:00 the. My order was wrong. Called back and the manager hung up on me!!! Rudest manager ever!!!!

name: Sharon Henderson
text: The food is always good. They drivers are always nice.but they always forget my Bluecheese. They forgot again today.😒

name: Gigi Williams
text: This is the best pizza place in town. I have always had great food, great service and timely deliveries. I love pizza and have had so many problems with delivery places, but this store is top notch!

name: Crystal Chadwick
text: Good food but you got to pay for your sauce for your cheesey bread😢

resp.text: It sounds like you're frustrated, Crystal.  We always appreciate feedback and we'd like to hear more from you.  Please share this with our Customer Support Team at bit.ly/dpz_cares & please include reference #3595861.  *Benjamin

name: Shadow334
text: The pizza and the wings were hot and arrived ahead of time. There is not to complain about. My family enjoyed it.

name: Katrina Powell
text: Heather called about my order and made sure changes were correct.  Order hot and correct.  Pleasant delivery person.  Delicious.

name: Ya-Done Goofed-88
text: I mostly use them for delivery but as you would expect. They normaly come on time as well as having the best pizza that's crazy good its worth it. The coupons they offer are also on point which I use everytime I order from them.

name: Stacy Green
text: We have had an issue every time we have ordered and it's impossible to get anyone to answer the phone there.

name: Cathy Dodwell
text: Ordered pizza and wings over an hour ago and still no pizza already got money from my account

name: Andrew Defee
text:
Have used this location consistently (weekly/biweekly) for last few months - food nearly always hot, orders have all been accurate so far.

Only complaint is drivers are hit and miss. Sometimes they get here quickly, sometimes has taken them 35 mins for a 10 minute drive.

Out of all the chain pizza places in the area, this Dominos is easily the best and most consistent.

name: David Moynihan
text: It's standard fare Domino's. Friendly staff. Great value.  Consistent with other Domino's.

name: D F
text:
The Opelika, Alabama store is terrible!
4 straight orders in the past year that never showed up or came 90 min late cold.

name: Salisa Love
text: Dang near cold

name: Brent Harris
text: A pizza was delivered with big blow out bubbles from the crust. This pizza should have never been boxed much less delivered.

name: Mike Hamilton
text: We have just ordered a pizza we earned through your rewards program. Stop the program. If you are going to put half the ingredients on the free pizzas, then your rewards program sucks...

name: Tabitha Prestridge

resp.text: Thanks for the awesome review, Tabitha! *Brandon
