text: We have patronized them for 20+yrs.! We have always favored the Ultimate Supreme. We always paid $9.00, almost a year ago the price went to $12.00. When I asked why, I was told they had increased the toppings. Well they didn't lie, a lot more bell peppers, some as long as my finger and as wide as two fingers. And onions, chunks of onion, never separated, just chunks! I took one slice and picked off the onions and peppers, that amounted to a heaping hand full! What was left was a slice with a single slice of pepperoni and about 3peices of sausage and very little cheese. The pizza had no taste other than a watery taste! They should name it the vegan bell pepper and onion TASTELESS PIZZA! As long time customers, needless to say we are very dissapointed! Other pizza resteraunts are pulling similar stunts! So we will not be patronizing little Little Caesars any more! Also the most cheese and peperroni, tastes like it was made with processed cheese covered with a little mozzarella, and few if any more peperroni! It will not melt the cheese when reheated! Thank you for your PAST SERVICE!

name: M. Connell
text: We got the opportunity to visit this Papa Murphy's location on a recent trip to Birmingham.  Excellent!  We snuck in right before closing and were nicely greeted.  We chose our favorite, the vegetarian pizza.  The white sauce is so yummy, and is one of the special choices that makes this chain great.  It's on about 1/2 of the pizza choices.  Another selling point of this chain is the ability to customize your pizza.  Lots of ingredients you don't see else where- like artichoke hearts. We didn't make the pizza until the next evening's dinner, and it still baked up great - flavorful crust rose nicely and then that great crispy on the outside, somewhat soft on the inside finish.  Wonderful pizza with lots of choices.

text: We tried this place tonight after hearing a lot of good things about it. I ordered "The Dirty Dill" which is a specialty pizza that they are known for. My husband ordered a calzone. The calzone was good with the exception of half of it, being burnt on the bottom. The "Dirty Dill" was good. I personally didn't feel that it lived up to the "hype". They offered 4 different bottled drinks (coke, diet coke, sprite, and Dr.Pepper). They don't offer any fountain drinks or water. So, if you want something else to drink, I would suggest bringing it with you. I included pictures of the pickle pizza.

text:
The best tasting pizza I've had in a very long time! Let's start with toppings,  we've tried 4 different pizzas.  The dirty dill! Pickles on pizza is a must try if you haven't already.  The John Wayne! All the meaty goodness with a kick of jalapeños!  Yummy.  The Vegetater! Super fresh veggies pair great with the red sauce! The portabella mushrooms  are freaking amazing! The Red! A classic cheese pizza that we bought for the kids, and then finished their leftovers!
The crust has great flavor and just the right thickness and crispness!
If you haven't given Nate's a try ad definitely recommend doing so. We gladly drive 25 minutes to get their pizza over any other place around!

text: Our order was for delivery. I placed the order online, ordered 5 items from the $5 deal menu and it was delivered within  1 hour. The food was good and delivery driver was courteous.

name: E.C.
text: 5 dollar discount for a 2 hour old and cold pizza. Had to go pick it up after waiting 2 hours for delivery. Driver carries a gun. Nearest dominos delivered to hotel pretty fast...

name: Amber
text: Ordered pizza for my family... it's been 2 hours... still not here yet... very upset.

name: Tonya And Jason
text: Went in to get dinner with my husband and 2 teenage girls, was greeted and asked dine in or carry out, said dine in, as we were being taken to the table the waiter said so much for getting off early and getting out of here and rolled his eyes! It made me so mad we decided to just order our pizza to go, what’s even worse is when we told the girl at the counter why we were not eating in she said yeah we all want off early. Won’t ever go back to this Pizza Hut again!!

name: Ed Roberts
text: Read all the reviews on this one. My experience was for delivery. It took a pinch over an hour. The bread sticks were every hard and swimming in butter. The pizza was ok, two large supreme.. read the reviews. The delay is real. No really a big deal but it should be mentioned.

name: Darren Mullins
text: Horrible service and don't even answer the phone sometims

name: Danielle Glaster
text: Ordered my pizza a 5:45 p.m Pizza Hut is 2.3 miles away. It is now 6:50 p.m ........I’m a mad pregnant customer.

name: Roderick Starks
text:
OMG!! Where do I begin????
I got there only to find the door locked. I had to be buzzed in.
Once inside, I thought I had walked into a third world country.
No one inside is wearing gloves, no one inside was wearing a hair net, the credit card swipe machine wasn't working, and one of the delivery drivers was wearing a gun on his hip.
That's right, dude was packing a pistol.
It's just my opinion,  but I feel that if you need to carry a glock to deliver pizzas, that may not be the best career choice for you.

name: Shuntay Gary
text: The pizza was horrible!!!! No sauce on the pizza and it tasted funny!!

name: Alexis Small
text: Pizza was cold!

name: David Schwarz
text: The delivery took an hour when they predicted 30 minutes.  That doesn't really bother me much.  I ordered a garlic knots pizza, and not only was the cheese inside the knots NOT melted, there was barely a hint of any of it in there. Stuff crust comes with 10 times more cheese,  you are just paying extra for hollowed out bread and a side of pizza sauce. Even after I tried throwing a knot in the microwave to melt the thin wall of cheese, it still wasn't noticable when I tasted it.

name: Jennifer Harrison
text: My food is always hot fresh and delivered in 15 or 20 minutes. ..the delivery drives are always friendly

name: Gary Grimes
text: Slow but good pizza

name: Martha Files
text: Meat lovers bought for my relative delicious.

name: Minister Carl Lee Johnson
text: Good food

name: Precious Plummer
text: Love they're pizza it's my favorite pizza place.

name: Patricia Cooper-Holifield
text: I was very disappointed with my pizza this trip. On average, their pizzas are well made.

name: Denita shaw
text: Everytime i order here , It takes them an 1hr to 1hr & 30mins. I really dont have a problem with it but When they do finally deliver it ,its never a im sorry for the wait or anything!

name: justin d
text: The best store of them all

name: darryl franklin
text: Was staying at a hotel in Bessemer ordered a pizza they never brought it. I called back to check on my order but my order for some reason got canceled. Their service is awful. I called dominos and got a great pizza .thanks pizza hut.

name: anthony harris
text: First off it took an hour for my pizza to arrive. Second the pizza don't tase like an oven pizza it tast like they put that bit in the microwave so the pizza was not done all the way. The pizza was falling apart. The crust was sticky. It had no pizza sauce. And my stomach hurt. It really wasn't worth the wait. I righteously want my money back. I am guy that enjoys food but I don't enjoy this not one bit.  They dint even cut the pizza good. The only thing that was was the mountn dew I ordered.

name: misty wilson
text: Very good pizza as far as pizza goes. Top quality 2 very good thumbs up

name: Ke'Aira Gray
text: Start delivering on the south side, losing money and customers

name: Rayuna
text: Great place to pick up, order, or get pizza delivered.

name: Kewanee Fox
text: Pizza wasn't cooked correctly.  Staff wasn't the best.

name: LauraLSodomick
text: We ordered and 15 late we did a follow up call and the Manager who stated his name is Joshua said they had issues and the store hadn't opened.  We explained we had ordered on his online site and have confirmation numbers and he stated "That is not our website cooperate does that"  Again stated we have confirmation why did not one call and inform us, he said they are in charge of online orders and it's not his fault.   This is really bad service and if you call there cooperate office the don't take phone calls until 1pm CST.    This process is a joke.     The manager should have been apologizing not blaming the cooperate office where you can't reach anyone.

name: Jeff Marks
text: No dine in, mildew odor. Pizza sub par. Foul attitude from counter.

name: Lacie Tidwell
text: The pizza was bad and was not all it was cracked up to be for the price

name: Zycoryous Abrams
text: Won't be ordering from here anymore! Orders are never right! First time they forgot my 20oz drink and now they just forgot my cinnabons.

name: Prince Clemons

name: sidney m35023
text: The service was not good informed manager and wasn't great either

text: The pizza good it's their attitude

text: Unsanitary.. the worker wasn’t wearing any gloves.

text: Well when you wait 2 hours for a pizza and they never show up and for an hour my order was the next out the door, I'm pretty ticked off!!!!

name: ana jimenez
text: Very bad service they took one Hour and 30 minutes to deliver my pizza was cold and they didn’t do what I order I have to call 3 times to the store to ask about my order and they hand up the phone on me never again 👎🏼

text: Staff questionable but pizza was delicious

text: Rude nasty

text: Too slow. Wayyy too slow. If you're thinking about getting food from there than my advice is you look elsewhere.

text: I placed a order they call back 2min later and say they r done delivering 10:53 two drivers r off 😡😡😡bad business very unprofessional !! Please hire more workers #management

text: Just pizzeria

text: Weren't allowed to go in to eat. Was told only drive-thru was open at 4:00 p.m.?

name: Rosalyn Bailey
text: Called to order and they put me on hold but never came back to the phone....

text: It was painful over charged with half the order and few toppings.$42.00 for a all the way pizza and 18 wings

name: Hayhay Moore
text: Too slow. Wayyy too slow. If you're thinking about getting food from there than my advice is you look elsewhere.

text:

It gave me diareah

name: Curtis Jones
text:
(Translated by Google) Pizza Theft

(Original)
Goid Pizza

name: Cheryl Brown
text: So stuffed so much food . Our server Christopher was awesome, we did not have to ask for drink refills.

name: Lindsay Hall
text: The nice counter employee forgot to put in our order on a busy Friday night. I got there and she was so upset with herself and kept apologizing. She got the cooks to make my pizza quickly. We tried the Wild In Havana pizza tonight and it's my new favorite! Love my local Mellow Mushroom!!

name: Jeremiah Harrell
text: Delicious pizza, with a wide variety of flavors to enjoy. Friendly service but a bit understaffed. Tables are too close as neither my dining partner nor myself were able to comfortably sit. The bench was so close to the table that the table was pushing into our stomachs. And I am an average sized adult, so this was not due to the size of my stomach, but due to the layout of benches being back to back and all of the tables in one aisle....

name: Cheryl Towles
text: Pretty good, large pie 26.99

name: Michaela Phillips
text: I went to Mellow Mushroom last night. Chris was my waiter. He did a great job. He has an amazing attitude and made my experience so much better with his smile and kindness. He was so funny and interactive. Definitely recommend!!

name: Sammie Thach
text: My partner and I had the best time! Our waiter, Chris, was attentive and nice. The food was really quick and the drinks were so good. I’d come back again so fast

name: Britney O
text: This was awful. Don’t come here and spend your money. My pizza was extremely oily. The bottom of the pan was covered in oil and then drip down my hand ( yes that much oil)!!! Would expect any better for $15 dollars. Waiter then proceeded to tell me this was how it was made. I will never be back.

name: Samantha Sasser
text: Last night was my first time going to Mellow Mushroom and I was honestly surprised. The cooks are phenomenal, the Holy Shiitake Pie was SINFUL. Our server was Christopher and he was kind, kept our drinks full, checked on us throughout our visit and was the one to suggest this awesome pizza. Will definitely be a regular!

name: W Barringer
text: So I decided to have pizza for lunch today. Figured I will call mellow mushroom in Prattville they always have good service and great food. Of course I ordered my typical meal The White Rabbit no tomatoes.. when I arrived at mellow mushroom to pick up my order I noticed something was different about my pizza but I couldn't tell what. It wasn't until maybe 30 minutes later when I was actually able to eat my white rabbit pizza. As soon as i took my first bite i realized Holy Cow!!! This is the best White Rabbit ive ever received from here.. thankfully i was able to catch the name of the cook that made my pizza while i was there. So shout out to Bailey (hopefully that's how it's spelled) for putting some love into my favorite pizza, The White Rabbit. Keep the oven hot for me because I will be back for another piece of pie!! Thank you Miss Cece for having such a wonderful staff.

name: Scott Tidwell
text:
They were very understaffed, and it took a while to get a seat. But everyone working was very nice and apologetic. Pizza was great as usual with Mellow Mushroom.

They were clearly overworked but were making the best of a bad situation and made sure everyone was eventually taken care of.

name: Travis Wilson
text: Had issues with lack of staffing. Hostess didn't check for us outside and scratched us off the list. Very apologetic.  Good food.

name: Kimberly Cole Zemke
text: Great food.  Great service.  Huge pizzas, giant meat lovers Calzone.  Beer pretzels with cheese were excellent!!  Love this place

name: Sean McKay
text: My family and I were turned away because they were "out of cheese". We were not offered anything else. Just we're closing the kitchen early and buh bye. Also there were signs posted everywhere EXCLAIMING  how understaffed they were. This restaurant has major problems from staffing to supply chain. I would avoid until they can get their act together.

name: Tami Gorman
text: The service was lacking , but very friendly  they burnt our pizza and still served  it we sent it back.. good food but very bland.. im Italian they need to spice better, and way too much salt on pretzels..won't return

name: Sandy Ivy
text: Pizza was too doughy and cheesy for me.  But the service was great.

name: Kainda Kainda
text: Oh gosh where to begin? I went in with my son and was told there was a 30 minute wait, normally I wouldn't mind but the restaurant was practically empty they maybe had a total of 5 tables. A group came in shortly after us and were refused service because they were to many people in their group( I think they said they were 10) the waitress looked super uncomfortable telling them that management said they were too understaffed and could not accommodate such a large party. When we were finally seated our waitress went AWOL after taking our order. No drink refills and didn't check on us after giving us our order. We had no plates or utensils. The only thing that made our night was Chris and Valerie. Although we were not their table they still took care of us getting all the things we were missing and checking in on us. Will not be back.

name: Steve Namie
text: Slow service.  Not crowded at all. Not worth the cost

name: Allison Ciara
text:
Food was bland, it is not a mellow mushroom , just the name.
It looks like a capitan ds. Super disappointed all around.

name: nickole Edwards
text: Our server Chris  was awesome!! The food was great, my kids enjoyed the atmosphere and it wasn't a long wait.

name: Chuck
text: The food was excellent but it was slow. I don't know if they were getting a bunch of call in orders but it wasn't very busy so I'm not sure why the food took so long. The waitress was apologetic and comped us some pretzels to make us for it so that was nice. Once we got the food it was delicious.

name: Jim McDonald
text: I just walked out after waiting 45 minutes for a cheese and onion pizza. I paid for my beer and left. The waiter was pleasant and apologized for the delay and said that a lot of to go orders had been called in so that’s why it was taking so long. Come to find out they had not even started on my pizza after 45 minutes. Won’t be back

name: Sergio Gomez
text: Expensive pizza. Hella long wait, even for a beer. Watch the fine print that got me when I ordered roasted pork

name: Stephanie Calcote
text: Great dining experience! Chris was amazing! I will definitely be back!

name: Heather Wilson
text: I love they have gluten free options.  I got the Kosmic Karma, and it was sooo good.  Took the other half home to my son who devoured it.  The new Avocado Smash was mouth-watering good (not served gluten free, but hubby said the bread served with it was delish.  I ate it without bread).

name: Tyler Holmes
text: Food was great! We loved our experience there with our waiter Chris being so helpful and engaging !! Definitely recommend

name: Kathy Kelley
text: Everything was good!  Had appertisers,  wings, and 2 different kinds of pizza.  A very enjoyable dinner!

name: Michael White
text: Very good pizza, great service. The margaritas are a little pricey st $10 a pop but very good.

name: Christine Greene
text: I had a wonderful time at this Mellow Mushroom! The pizza's flavor was phenomenal! The staff are so sweet and they treat you like family. The food is a little pricey but the ingredients are so worth it in my opinion! I had a ham and pineapple calzone and the RB margarita. The margarita was delicious and strong but Mellow Mushroom, please don't change it because it could just be my low tolerance. Lol. My daughter had a pineapple large pizza. She thought that it was delicious and cheesy! It was burning hot, so be sure to watch your fingers!  Would visit again!

resp.text: Awesome glad you enjoyed us please come again

name: Michael White
text: Very good pizza, great service. The margaritas are a little pricey st $10 a pop but very good.

name: Kathy Kelley
text: Everything was good!  Had appertisers,  wings, and 2 different kinds of pizza.  A very enjoyable dinner!

name: Zach Holmes
text: I wish I could give this place negative 5 stars! They never get anything correct. How difficult is it to get an order correct???? Never go here!!!!! They almost killed my wife by putting mushrooms on the pizza when they were told not to do so!!! Awful, awful, awful. I never leave reviews, but please heed this one and boycott this establishment.

name: Josh Green
text: I wouldn't even give 1 star! This place was awful! We were seated and the waitress forgot our drinks and plates. We barely saw the waitress And when we did we had to find her! The pizza was completely raw. The people cooking in the back had food and drinking frappes as they were cooking. I just wasted 50$ on pizza that i could've spent 5$ on at little caesars! The waitress in her own terms "kept forgetting about us" .. Would not recommend this place at all..

name: Sandra Burdell
text: Great pizza! Great company❤

name: John Douglas
text: I love the Holy Shiitake Pie and it did not disappoint!

name: Christopher Carr
text: Me and my family come here From time to time never had a problem we go today me and my wife on our lunch break we can notice everybody's getting their food but us nobody comes and tells us anything So finally we get a server that's not our server because are server Has a stuck up attitude no management no one comes in and see how we are we ordered cheesy bread which came on time I ordered a calzone my wife ordered a half sandwich come to find out our food has been sitting on top of the oven for God knows how long will not be coming back to this location.

name: David Coleman
text: Sorry service. Left before they came to set is down, we washed so long. Asked why, they didn't want us waiting at a table

name: Kimberly Joseph
text: Can I give a 0?   We were told we would be seated in 15 minutes in an outside seating  area.  After 58 minutes we were still waiting.  The manager made rude remarks about having to seat our party of 10 and he would "get around to it". So we took our group to Buffalo Wild Wings were we were greeted, seated and served in a professional and timely manner.

name: Killer Kyller
text: Kitchen  crew is amazing very hard workers and food is awesome

name: Aron Wilde
text: Arrived 30in to closing. Welcomed in anyways.  Excellent job on the pizza!  But paper straws? Really? Your garbage goes to a hole I the ground, not the ocean.

name: Andrea Brewer
text: My experience was amazing, Christopher Hallman was an amazing server!

name: Mollie Waters
text: Pizza was not good. Service was very slow. They were closing early that day, and it felt like we were being rushed.

name: David Stinard
text: I waited an hour Friday night to get an order of pretzel bites and the barmaid never even came back to ask me about a refill on my beer during that. Of time I said what's going on with my order she says they're back up that's a crock they got four people behind the counter spread and over pizzas and whatever they were lucky if they had 25 people in there at the most I will not go back there in the evening time ever again

name: Patsy Heaton
text: Very clean place and nice staff.

name: elijah andrews
text: I normally dig this place but I doubt I'll return. Had horrible service and waited over 30 minutes for an appetizer. Waitress came to check on us twice the entire visit, no refills till we got our check, food was pretty burned and overall would rather have just burned the 40 dollars I spent here. If you were my waitress, don't take the $0 tip personally, you just didn't do anything for us.

name: Johnny Villarreal
text: Never been here! Will be returning excellent pizza and Philly cheese steak hoagie!

name: Jimmy Johnson
text:
Food was good but they service was terrible.
Waiter had to come back to our table 3 times ask what we wanted to drink. There was only two of us and we had asked for water and sweet tea.

name: Dale Burns
text: Great location and excellent pizza!

name: Aurora Bradley
text: One of my favorite places! Super friendly staff :)

name: Blair S
text: Arrived at 720 for dinner. Stood there for 10 min and then were told at 730 they were not seating anyone else the rest of the night.

name: Todd Baker
text: Good sandwich. Good wine. Good service. Could use more menu options.

name: Audrey Bazzell
text: We had a very pleasant experience there with the people who work there!!! Food was awesome!!!!

name: Laura Lucas
text: Always the best hummus EVER. Tried the buffalo chicken pizza for the first time and it was DELICIOUS!

name: Jodi Moore
text: Food was good, service could have been a little better

name: Sable Lewis
text: Yummy in my tummy :)

name: Ambassadoria McGhee
text: I love it! They are really nice

name: Ann Wooten
text: First time I ate there in years, food has gone down hill. Very disappointing

name: Sophie Bear
text: Took an hour and a half to be seated when we were told it would be a 20 minute wait. Didn’t get our food until after two hours. I understand they’re not seating full capacity but it seemed like no one was even working. Not a single employee had their mask on, just hanging around their necks... a lot of employees just standing around.

name: Adrienne Barringer
text: Love the new management! Food was on point! Try the Thai Sweet Chili wings!

name: Curtis Davis
text: Good service!! Plenty of indoor and outdoor seating. Variety of foods to choose.

name: Gia Ivey
text: Was told there was a 20-25 minute wait sat on wood bench by hostess stand. People who had walked in the last ten minutes are seated. I listened to them sign in (no, they did not have reservations)They are seated within 10 minutes, 4 if them, 4 of us. I questioned it. She said our name was not on the list. I told her I watched her write it on there because it said “and a booster seat”.m and noticed she was left handed. Told her 2 names now on bottom of list and 7 families waiting. She said the list must have been accidentally erased by another employee. We have been sitting there the whole time. She was the only employee at the hostess desk. She came and went back and forth, cleaning tables, and hanging out with waitresses talking and laughing. She didn’t go around to see who all needed to be added back so lots of complaints. One guy ask her would it be much longer, if so, he needed to leave and go somewhere else. She said, “bye”. They did not have on name tags. She had short, one length, dark curly hair, blue eyes. The waitresses were standing around talking. People would leave and the table would be empty over 30 minutes before they’d clean it and seat someone. Poor management and hostess with bad attitude. Also goofing off waitresses. Man with grey hair and beard making pizzas had mask wrapped around his neck, not covering nose or mouth, right over the pizza’s. Bleach blonde guy flicking his hair everywhere and digging ear wax out his ear with gloves and looking at it did not change gloves and leaned up on pizza counter where pizzas were. Bathroom beyond filthy. Took over an hour to get pizza. New waitress in training was the only one not goofing. They had a lot of employees and only half capacity. I’d hate to seen it if it were full capacity. They will close soon. Grey haired, grey beard man came to table at the end and asked how was it?  He had no solution to the waiting list getting erased and act out out because I complained. I have a solution. Do away with the dry erase board and wet rag and try a paper and pen and hire a hostess that doesn’t have an attitude problem, wear you mask correctly, and provide service.

name: Carla Gwin
text: Good food. Good service for the most part. Forgot to put in an order for one in our party but they made up for it by taking it off her bill. Good beer selection.

name: River Lotus
text: Wonderful vegan pizza. My pizza was not prepared correctly and had to be remade. The manager was amazing and came out to tell me that they did not bring my pizza out because it was not prepared right. She prepared my pizza and put it in a  ox for me to go. Great service even with a mistake. The pizza was wonderful.

name: Mary Ann Clayton
text: My salad didn't include all the items advertised. Did take out order on line. Once arrived didn't feel they were adhering to the safe distance rules in place; therefore, didn't check my order while there.

name: Jason Dean
text: They sat us at a dirty table, had to wait 5 minutes before coming to our table, served one of our two pizzas to the wrong table, then tried to bring it to us in a pandemic!  Took the pizza back and recooked it because of the risk.   Never comped it,  Never asked for refills.  Just a horribly ran business, and I’ll take my money elsewhere.

resp.text:
Jason, I apologize for your experience at Mellow. I will certainly remind our Staff about the importance of proper sanitation standards during this pandemic. We are struggling a little getting back into the swing of things and all the new standards applied to a restaurant. I am happy to mail you some gift certificates if you will kindly send me your address.
Thank you!

name: jeffrey Elliott
text: Great place and good food. A bit of a wait, but worth it. Highly recommend

name: Caje Knight
text: I love pizza and this place does not disappoint. First of all, website said open til midnight. Worked late, got there at 10:30pm and sign on door said closes at 11:00pm. Even though the place was empty and the employees were cleaning up, they seated us without hesitation even though we said we would leave. Food came out fast. Pepperoni pizza had both a crispy yet chewy crust, loved it. Thanks to the manager and crew for being so accommodating. Wish I had a Mellow Mushroom near me.

name: Brittani Baker
text: I'm rating it a 5 star based on our waitress. She was amazing! The food was not all that great. My pita bread was extra crispy and the pizza was just "okay" but our waitress was on point. Always asking if we needed anything and really friendly. I can't remember her name, but she was young with brown wavy hair

name: Veronica Mathews
text: The food is so good! The atmosphere is relaxed but also fun. Hands down the best spinach and artichoke dip I've ever had!

name: Jason Dean
text: They sat us at a dirty table, had to wait 5 minutes before coming to our table, served one of our two pizzas to the wrong table, then tried to bring it to us in a pandemic!  Took the pizza back and recooked it because of the risk.   Never comped it,  Never asked for refills.  Just a horribly ran business, and I’ll take my money elsewhere.

Thank you!

text: I'm rating it a 5 star based on our waitress. She was amazing! The food was not all that great. My pita bread was extra crispy and the pizza was just "okay" but our waitress was on point. Always asking if we needed anything and really friendly. I can't remember her name, but she was young with brown wavy hair

name: Jimmy Boswell
text: Good food and fun .

name: Caje Knight
text: I love pizza and this place does not disappoint. First of all, website said open til midnight. Worked late, got there at 10:30pm and sign on door said closes at 11:00pm. Even though the place was empty and the employees were cleaning up, they seated us without hesitation even though we said we would leave. Food came out fast. Pepperoni pizza had both a crispy yet chewy crust, loved it. Thanks to the manager and crew for being so accommodating. Wish I had a Mellow Mushroom near me.

name: Samantha Lursen
text: The food was good and I understand why they only had seating on the patio during this time. Our server was very nice. However, we waited over an hour for food. For two small pizzas. If an establishment is short staffed during this reopening of businesses, that's perfectly understandable. But they should be alerting patrons that there will be a wait for receiving you're order so that we can make a decision on eating or leaving. I needed to drive home to Mobile (2.5hrs away) and would have been home sooner and not driving as much in the dark. The staff wore gloves but not masks as most resturants now are, it doesnt bother my party as much, but if you're looking to dine in places with a bit more safety precautions, please be advised.

name: Veronica Mathews
text: The food is so good! The atmosphere is relaxed but also fun. Hands down the best spinach and artichoke dip I've ever had!

name: david watson
text: I've been to many mellow mushrooms across the eastern united states. All have been a 4 or 5, this one however was not. The staff wasn't as attentive as they could be. We sat for quite some time for food. The pizza we ordered was wrong but after sitting for so long we decided to eat it and not remark on it. The check came out wrong by approximately 5 dollars, on the high end. Again, as the staff was too busy to come back by and was in a rush, we called it a loss, paid the bill, and left. The food was good quality but the atmosphere and staff was on the bottom end of mellows I've been to.

name: John Hermann
text: Good service. Classic American food choices. I really like their pizzas and the open kitchen design is cool to watch them make stuff.

name: Matt Jones
text: This is a really good Mellow Mushroom location. Best Mellow Mushroom pizza I've had. Good service and a good clean store. We are always on the lookout for Mellow Mushroom, because of the gluten-free option for a family member. So, if you are looking for gluten-free, you can get one there. This location is especially good for trips to the coast on I-65 for us.

name: patricia chambless
text: The food is always great.  There was a group of 14 that walked in and the manager said we can’t f..... handle them.  He was barking out orders instead of helping the employees.  Bad management

name: Sarah Little
text: Lothaire lunch menu prices and their cheese bread is amazing

name: Kirk Anderson
text: Great food and service. Always a treat to go!

name: chad reese
text: Where's all the staff at.. only 5 people working. Poorly ran in my opinion..

name: Tracey Ellis
text: Very friendly staff except we was looking for our favorite server Jay I guess she doesn't work there anymore or maybe was off but I can say that girl is one hell of a good server best service we have ever gotten from visiting mellow mushroom hopefully we get to have her as a server again soon!!!!!!

name: tndobson1
text: Order via curbside and it said that it would be ready at a specific time. I get there at the time and my pizza hadn’t even been started yet. And no one is checking for curbside pick ups so you have to go in.

name: Terri Jones
text: Good. Good. And delicious

name: B Smith
text: Nice clean restaurant. Very large building. No wait.

name: Frank D
text: I wish I could give 0 stars. We arrived at about 6:55pm and were immediately seated. Shortly thereafter, the waitress took our drink order and returned and then took our food order. We finally received our food at 8:00pm. During the whole visit we didn’t receive any drink refills while numerous waitresses stood around chatting with the floor supervisor. Also behind us, a group of teenage hostesses were also standing around and acting obnoxious. My wife’s salad looked and tasted as tho it sat out the whole time we were waiting for our meal. I can understand if a business is busy and running behind but when others who are seated and their orders are taken after us receive their meals 30 minutes before we are, then that’s ridiculous. I was infuriated at how little care was given when the floor supervisor (who was literally 15 feet from our table) could clearly see that we weren’t receiving any service at all and ignored it. Not sure if I’ll ever return to this place again.

name: Patrick Biggar
text: Good pizza but the final bill is always$30 with tip

name: Mark Byrne
text:
We decided to try MM in Prattville instead of our usual meal at a nearby Mexican Restaurant.

Great choice!

We were seated right away, hostess was very helpful and polite.

Jillian took great care of us as I ordered pizza and a couple of cold beers.

Price was very reasonable and we will return!

Great job Jill!

See you soon!

name: B Smith
text: Nice clean restaurant. Very large building. No wait.

name: shannon la
text: Waitress was awesome. But the place has NO ac, so expect to sweat your ass off while you try to eat.

resp.text: Shannon, thank you.  Stay mellow

name: Tracey Ellis
text: Very friendly staff except we was looking for our favorite server Jay I guess she doesn't work there anymore or maybe was off but I can say that girl is one hell of a good server best service we have ever gotten from visiting mellow mushroom hopefully we get to have her as a server again soon!!!!!!

name: Sarah Shire
text: My husband and I went to Mellow mushroom for the first time last night! loved the funky q chicken pizza & my husband got a hoagie that he loved as well! Our waitress was great. Can't wait to go back :)

name: M K
text: These guys must not want money. Poor service, broken website, 0 customer service. Food is Digornio's.

name: Jotaro Kujo
text: The pizza was was great! There was so much of the pizza to handle, I had to take it home because I could not finish it.

name: Mark Byrne
text:
We decided to try MM in Prattville instead of our usual meal at a nearby Mexican Restaurant.

Great choice!

We were seated right away, hostess was very helpful and polite.

Jillian took great care of us as I ordered pizza and a couple of cold beers.

Price was very reasonable and we will return!

Great job Jill!

See you soon!

text: I wish I could give 0 stars. We arrived at about 6:55pm and were immediately seated. Shortly thereafter, the waitress took our drink order and returned and then took our food order. We finally received our food at 8:00pm. During the whole visit we didn’t receive any drink refills while numerous waitresses stood around chatting with the floor supervisor. Not sure if I’ll ever return to this place again.

name: Paul Finkley
text: Love Mello Mushroom pizza!

name: Miranda Schnell
text: Very clean, friendly staff and awesome pizza!

name: Rich Corirossi
text: Way over priced. The staff apologized but offered no discount.

name: Colin Kerns
text: It was good, but they did give me mustard packets for the pretzels instead of easily dipped mustard

name: Donna Willis
text: Always great food and even better service!

name: Amanda Bilbrey
text: We were in town visiting the safari park and my little girl wanted pizza so we decided to go to Mellow Mushroom. The food was excellent, but the customer service was awful. When we got there they were not busy at all & we saw several empty tables, but were told it would be a 10-15 minute wait, which we were fine with. 30 minutes later we were finally seated. (We also had a 3 year old & 1 year old with us who at this point had become very ill). When we were seated we were asked if we needed a high chair & of course we said yes please. Well they never brought one so my husband had to go hunt one. They took our order in a timely manner, but it took forever to get our food & when it came out we had no silverware and apparently nobody knew where any was. It took about an hour and a half to get in and out where normally it would be 45 minutes in & out. We love Mellow Mushroom & try to eat at other locations as often as possible, but we will not be back to the Prattville location.

name: Deja Motley
text: The staff was friendly and food was delicious. I will definitely be coming back. This was my first time and it made a great first impression.

resp.text: Thank you so much for the 5 stars it was our pleasure

name: Julia G.
text: Great pizza!

name: Lacie Adams
text: They were not busy when we got there but it still took almost 20 minutes for the waitress to take our order. Our cheese bread appetizer came out room temperature.  We did speak to the manager (who was having to cook as well) and she apologized and stated they were very short handed. She took off the charge for the cheese bread and had it remade. The manager delivered the pizzas we ordered herself and they were very good. The waitress, however never checked on us again after we asked to speak to the manager... until we had already eaten and my husband had to get up to go to the bar and have his drink refilled. At that time he asked for the check and a box for the leftovers. After this is when the waitress finally came by and oblivious to everything that had happened in the past 30 minutes, asked if we were still doing alright.. this is the 2nd bad visit we have had there. I am not sure we will go back to this location.

name: Christopher Backus
text: Great pizza as always! We had a large group of work colleagues and they dedicated a private area to us, perfect for our needs. The event worked perfectly.

resp.text: Awesomely I’m so glad everything went Mellow smooth for you guys

name: Larry Thompson
text: Great service!  Food was really good as well.

name: Angela Wilson
text: Bad service. Cook did not get the order correct. Employees were all standing around talking. Need I say more?

resp.text: Angela, please contact us at the store so that figure out what happened. Ask for Ted the Manager, 334-290-2088. Thank you

name: Jimmy Jacobs
text: I just love the pizza at the Mellow Mushroom pizzeria's. They use fresh ingredients and generous portions with each pizza. At this location our server was at our table a little too much. But, at least he was attentive. We enjoyed our food and as always enjoyed ourselves.

name: Bear ʕ•ᴥ•ʔ
text: They gave me plates when I didn’t have any food and it made me more hungry, so I eat all the napkins to fill me up alittle.

name: Oz Madd
text: Come and see Brandon as your waiter. Best ever and will remember you with repeat business. Love the food here...better than other Mellow Mushrooms around the state...been to most. Just an awesome place to be! Good job Brandon!!

resp.text: Oz, we couldn't have said it any better.  Thank you for your review. Brandon is awesome, food is awesome, great beer selection!!! Stay mellow bud.

name: Shane Sexton
text: Pizza was Fantastic !!!

name: Devin Barnes
text: Pricey but good vibe place and the food is unique

name: william rolling
text: Good pizza, good service. Would recommend

name: John Dragoo
text: We stopped in Prattville, just off I-65, to eat at this Mellow Mushroom.  The facility was new, bright, and well-decorated.  The menu was similar to other Mellow Mushroom locations we've visited.  The food and the service were both good.

name: Melissa Baines
text: So this use to be: Good service good pizza most of the time. But I'm revising my review because they have gone way down hill. We are from Atlanta, GA and grew up eating this pizza. We have traveled all over the US and always eat at Mellows when we can find them. Lately every time we have gone here our order is not right and the pizza is just not great. Not once have we been compensated for the inconvenience of having to wait for them to fix their mistake. We are not looking for a hand-out just some average customer service would work, but but that is in short order these days. We love MM but will be switching to pies and pints, where we have yet to have anything close to a bad experience.

name: J E
text: Stopped in for quick bite and ofcourse a beautiful bloody Mary.

name: Gary Whiteside
text: Great service and food.  Love the pizza.

name: Jeremy Karr
text: Prices are a bit steep on salads. Food is good with original flavors.

name: Jason R Brown
text: It was really good food n good atmosphere

name: Bubbles Johnson
text: Best pizza place tho I do enjoy the other locations

name: Grace Cave
text: It has a nice sized room for family gatherings. Pizza isn't the best to me but that's my personal opinion

name: Bryan Holman
text: I had an awesome time at the bar....remember to ask for Clark!  Clark is super friendly and I enjoyed the conversation.  I had a few craft beers and I had the small pizza- Half And Half BTW with 2 different styles!😉. I would recommend!

resp.text: Bryan, thank you so much for your 5-star review!  Stay mellow bud.

name: Donna Dew
text: Best Greek salad in town. Ask for extra Fetta and Calamari olives.  The greek dressing is fabulous!  My grandkids fav for pizza.

name: Stacey Shadrick
text: Very nice. The atmosphere was cool, loved the music choice. The pizza we ate was the specialty meats pizza and it had very generous toppings. Will definitely go again.

resp.text: Awesome Stacey! Thank  you for the 5-star review.  Stay mellow.

name: Harold Stone
text: We were greeted and seated by friendly and efficient people.  The waiter helped us with the menu and promptly took our order and even took an adjustment.  The pizza came and we dug in.  There was no sauce.  We asked the waiter if we were supposed to ask for sauce and did he agree there was no sauce.  He said sauce was standard and we didn't have any.  He said he would bring it up to someone.  Did they offer to get us a pizza with sauce?  No.  Did they offer to comp us on the order?  No.  They offered a $2 discount.  When we complained they offered a $4 discount.  We will not be back.

resp.text: I am very sorry to hear that this happened. You should absolutely should have been offered a new pizza. I will make sure that Management is aware of this incident and that it does not occur again. Thank you and we do hope that you will come back to our Mellow Mushroom in Prattville.

name: Dulce Barrios
text: Great pizza but it took to long to get a pizza when there was only a few people

name: Joshua Thornton
text: Great food. High quality ingredients. Try the bruschetta, it's amazing.

name: Jenn Anderson
text: Food is always good, but the AC has apparently been broken for awhile. Just be prepared to be a bit uncomfortable if it's been a hot day.

name: Daniel Sheppard
text: Good service good pizza.

name: solomon abner
text: Pizza was horrible aside paying $25 for a medium veggie pizza which looked like a small. Not once offered a refill on my sweet tea. Asked for tofu on the pizza which was suppose to be on it anyway but got sprinkled crumbs of tofu they must have swept off the counter. I left and went little Caesars and got a $7 pizza thin crust that mellow trashroom out the water. The place is over rated and so is the lame pizza and empty garage ambiance .

name: Shelley A
text: Being from Atlanta, we've eaten and several MM through this years.  This location was no different and did not disappoint.  Very good service and the Kosmic Karma pie was very great!

resp.text: Awesome! Thank you and I’m so glad you had a Mellow experience with you hope too see you all on your next visit

name: James Bonner
text: Good food, and customer service.

name: Irv Drost
text: Great pie!

name: Tammu Lee
text: Loved it

name: Vicki Langham
text: Great service

name: Kevin Bingham
text: We have eaten at a number of Mellow Mushrooms throughout the country and including the original in Atlanta in Sandy Springs. This Mellow Mushroom did a great job in keeping up with the traditional Taste of their Pizza

resp.text: Thank you so much I’m so glad you enjoyed

name: Genevieve Lawhorn
text: Delicious pizza. Pet friendly. Was able to take our dog and sit out on the patio. Server was very nice and brought out water for our fur baby!

resp.text: 5-star's!  We love it! Stay mellow, Genevieve.

name: JB7
text: Wait staff was excellent. Despite being part of a large party and their being lots of kids, they stayed on top of all of our needs. I had a sandwhich for the first time and enjoyed it very much. We will be returning to this location over ones that are closer to our house because of the service.

name: Charles McMillian
text: Very hospitable place. Nice atmosphere. A bit pricey, but what isn't! Good place to take a special girl.

name: Colin McCammon
text: This is by far some of the best pizza that I have ever had. The service is great and the setting is very pleasing! In fact, we even decided to have a soccer party here in May! I would definitely go back here again!

resp.text: Colin, thank your for your 5-star review!!! Pizza is the best, especially from here!  Stay mellow.

name: Christopher Stitcher
text: We frequent Mellow. This is a spot we find relaxing in some parts if the restaurant and livlier in others. Food is always on point and service is typically good. Draft beer choices change frequently and they feature a lot of local breweries.

resp.text: Thank you for the 5-star review! Stay mellow.

name: Meridith Morfin
text: The service was wonderful and we got our food really fast! I've eaten at a few other locations and this one just wasn't the same. The facility wasn't as fun and the food wasn't quite the same.

name: Amanda Stitcher
text: I love pizza and Mellow Mushroom never fails to impress me. Our favorite appetizer to get are the garlic knots and I love how they have gluten free options. Made with healthier ingredients and big portions, you can't beat it!

resp.text: Amanda, thank you for the 5-star review!  Stay mellow.

name: Ed Miller
text: They have best pizza and soft pretzels.

name: You did What
text: Great food and great service.

name: Jeremy Peters
text:
I have no idea what happened.... restaurant had barely anyone in there and it too two hours to get my pizza. Asked for a water 5 times and still never got one.

Waiter disappeared and never aided cleaning up the table. Several waitresses stopped by to help and never resolved anything.

I still didn’t get a water... 🤷🏼‍♂️🤦🏼‍♂️

name: Eliza Minelli
text: Me and my family came in the other night and had the best time. Our server Brian was very attentive and helpful in helping us choose the perfect pie. He made sure he went the extra mile. However the few times we have came in the management was far more friendly/welcoming than the new guy they have. Such a shame the nice lady they had isn’t in the Prattville location any more.

resp.text: Thank you for the 5 star review!! Glad to hear that Brian took such good care of you and your family. See you again soon!

name: Gregory Hasten
text: I had the worst experience here I got a steak and cheese hoagie I promise u it was effortless they had no seasoning on the little bit of meat they put it was the most pathetic sandwich I’ve ever seen!!! To make things worse I called my order 20 min ahead and still had to wait another 20 , when I pulled off the lot there was like four cars the place was empty , so why should it take this long to make a hoagie !

name: Rick Molden
text: Good food, friendly service, clean

name: Eric Adams
text: 30 min wait for appetizer, it was cold when server brought it. Server came by one time after that, after we had been there for over an hour (manager brought food after we complained and had to go to bar to get coke refilled). Food was good, service was terrible.

name: Amy
text: This place totally exceeded my expectations! There was no wait, the staff was friendly and the food was delicious! I also cannot RAVE enough about the service from our waiter, Clark. He was, by far, the best waiter we've EVER had ANYWHERE! He was extremely friendly and kind, gave us options, and frequently checked back with us. We couldn't have asked for more. I will definitely come back!! Ask for Clark, you won't be disappointed!!

name: John Murray
text: We had a good time the service was incredible and quick

name: Maggie Adams
text: Mother’s Day and grossly understaffed. Host was serving tables so had to track down someone and ask if we could be seated outside. Restaurant was not even busy and were told it was a 45 minute wait to sit outside where only 2 other families were seated.

name: Debby Nunn
text: Took a long time to get food.  Steak and cheese on a hoagie roll. Pretty good. Bathroom in much needed attention.   Ok service.

name: Deanna Bonagura
text: Love their special pizzas. They have alot of vegetarian and vegan options. Good service

name: Jenner Cramer
text: Love the pizza. Service was great.

name: Raising Bozemans
text: The white shark is simply amazing!

name: Raising Bozemans
text: The white shark is simply amazing!

name: Deanna Bonagura
text: Love their special pizzas. They have alot of vegetarian and vegan options. Good service

name: Brian Kravitz
text: I lived in Atlanta when the first Mellow Mushroom opened. It was the best pizza in Atlanta. A little hole in the wall place with a screen door for an entrance. Personally I don't think they ever got the duplication of their recipe right when they branched out. The food at this location in Prattville is mediocre at best; although people around here would probably disagree with me. Then again, these folks think the Olive Garden is the best thing that ever happened to Italian food. If you're a "foodie" you know exactly what I'm saying.

name: Ed Miller
text: They have best pizza and soft pretzels.

name: Nate R
text: My buddy took me here when I was in town visiting. We got there just after they opened and there was hardly anyone else there. However, the servers and host were friendly and happy to chat with us for a minute, the food was good, and overall it was a positive experience.

resp.text: Thank you for your review!

name: Kyle Knell (Kyle Von Clausewitz)
text: Great service, good food.  Specialty pizzas looked delicious.  I had the mushroom club, and it was excellent.

name: Harry Renquist
text: We sat down outside, waitress brought us water. We waited 15 minutes for her to come back to take our food order. She never came, we got up and left. As we were getting in the car she asked us if we were leaving. Of course! Worst customer service ever.

name: Mephitz
text: Pretty damn good pizza. Prices were fair and the staff were quite friendly. Next time I'm in the US I'm definitely coming back.

resp.text: We thank you so much for your 5-star review!  We'll be looking for you until your next visit.  Stay mellow...

name: John Pirtle
text: Great food. We have enjoyed this restaurant for years and it is always topnotch.

resp.text: Thank you for the review

name: Michelle Hasenauer
text: So many choices for a pizza place. We ended up ordering way too much but it was worth it. Our new pizza place.

name: Brian Kravitz
text: I lived in Atlanta when the first Mellow Mushroom opened. It was the best pizza in Atlanta. A little hole in the wall place with a screen door for an entrance. Personally I don't think they ever got the duplication of their recipe right when they branched out. The food at this location in Prattville is mediocre at best; although people around here would probably disagree with me. Then again, these folks think the Olive Garden is the best thing that ever happened to Italian food. If you're a "foodie" you know exactly what I'm saying.

name: Harry Renquist
text: We sat down outside, waitress brought us water. We waited 15 minutes for her to come back to take our food order. She never came, we got up and left. As we were getting in the car she asked us if we were leaving. Of course! Worst customer service ever.

name: Jessica Meuse
text: Great pizza but not the most attentive staff. They used to have live music all the time, but even that isn’t there anymore. It’s good for a family dinner or to order and take out.

resp.text: We plan to have live music again.  We will be sure and get it on social media so that everyone knows and it can be a great evening for all!! Thank you and stay mellow.

name: Cindy Burroughs
text: Delicious pizza friendly staff

name: Manning Fox
text: TERRIBLE service but great pizza. we waited 2 hours for our 3 large pizzas. we asked our waitress for salad dressing and we never got it.

resp.text: I do apologize for the service you had at our restaurant however I’m glad you enjoyed your food and we hope to see you again

name: Tyler Clark
text: Best waitress ever, my we had to wait a long time and she brought a pizza that was just made out for him at no cost, super nice too, if there were ten stars I would give an 11

name: John Bonds
text: Very customer oriented

name: Brenda Gunter
text: Pizza was burnt service sucked they gave us paper straws which made our drinks taste like well paper. Dont go there

resp.text: Good morning I am so sorry your experience at Mellow was not what we strive for! Please contact the store today so that I may have the chance to make the situation right! Again I’m so sorry

name: Sam M
text: Celiac and gluten intolerant beware. Dishes were all dirty and even after asking for clean dishes we were just brought slightly less dirty dishes. Staff seemed completely clueless to the seriousness of having little pieces of crust on a plate for someone who cannot have gluten. I can only imagine what other corners they're skipping. I was so excited about eating at Mellow Mushroom after hearing good things through the gf community, but now I'm just praying somehow I avoided being glutened.

name: Polycarp Expedite
text:
I'm old school. I remember when cheese was put on top of pizzas and melted to keep your toppings from falling off. Not here.

So here I am, eating pizza with a Fork, how embarrassing, how embarrassing...

None of which is being factored into this rating, just thought I would share.

I'm starting to see a pattern here in Montgomery Alabama, great Atmosphere, great Visuals, Great Service, ...bland as hell food.

I got the house pizza to see what this place was about. The ingredients are good, but it's like, nothing was put with it, no flavor, no spices. Generally, for pizza, their red pizza sauce is their calling card to greatness, whereas I literally can not even taste a red sauce while I sit here eating it.

All this said, this sells here in Montgomery. I see a full restaurant, so just because I don't personally like it doesn't mean it isn't doing right by the customers.

So if you're a LOCAL, I'd say it's a 4 star restaurant for you.

If you're an OUT OF TOWNER that travels a lot, I'd say it's 2 stars, food wise.

Beautiful restaurant, wonderful service, bland food, must be the Montgomery Alabama way. I give 3 stars to balance my feeling here.

name: Brandi Tabb
text: The manager wqs very rude and had an attitude the entire time. I did not appreciate her tone.

name: Kevin Folse
text: Great food... very accommodating for food allergies!

name: Nate R
text: My buddy took me here when I was in town visiting. We got there just after they opened and there was hardly anyone else there. However, the servers and host were friendly and happy to chat with us for a minute, the food was good, and overall it was a positive experience.

resp.text: Thank you for your review!

name: Mephitz
text: Pretty damn good pizza. Prices were fair and the staff were quite friendly. Next time I'm in the US I'm definitely coming back.

resp.text: We thank you so much for your 5-star review!  We'll be looking for you until your next visit.  Stay mellow...

name: Christopher Jackson
text: Delicious place to eat. I recommend this to any one who loves pizza.

name: REDLADY 1982
text: Look I’m just going to be honest here. I’ve had the misfortune of frequenting this establishment 7 times since it opened up. And every single time was extremely negative. The first problem is every single time I’ve went was during a week day around 2-3 in the afternoon and the place was nearly empty and we were seated and promptly forgotten about every single time I’ve ever been there. I could possibly understand that if there was ever any more than 3-4 other couples in the establishment besides us but no the place has been absolutely almost empty every single time (of the 7) I’ve been there. The last time was around a couple of years ago. I went with my cousins wife and we ordered some of that humus bread she ordered a small pizza I ordered a sandwich. Well the humus came a couple minutes later her pizza came but my sandwich never did so I wound up eating the humus. When we were ready to go (waiter was nowhere to be found as usual there in a empty restaurant) I stood up and said hey we decided we do not want the sandwich can we just get the check for the rest we need to go. Well they tried to rapidly make the sandwich and give it to me with me telling them I did not want it. I didn’t want it because we were going several places and I didn’t want the food rotting and stinking up my car. Then they shoved the unwanted sandwich at me basically forcing me to take it and the waiter proceeded to start saying don’t blame him cause he isn’t the cook. Now he said to this to me and I worked in the restaurant business for 15 years and I knew they were having the chit chat hour and possibly doing side work. I told him well you should have asked the cook why your entire order wasn’t up. In a nutshell he actually started cussing me etc. Me and my my cousins wife left the childish pathetic situation threw the sandwich in the nearest garbage can and I’ve never went back to that establishment again and never will. From the 7 incidents I’ve had there frankly I’m amazed they have any clientele at all. I should have written this a long time ago but I had a lot of things going on in life and just now got the opportunity when the subject was brought back up in a conversation last night. This is NOT a fake review before the owner wants to chime in and claim so I’ll happily provide my receipts. If I could give this establishment negative stars I would. I do not recommend this establishment to anyone of any age group for any reason. Unfortunately this is the second negative review I’ve felt obligated to give and I’m upset with myself for not addressing the last incident back when it happened

name: James Moton
text: They have good food and lunch specials nice atmosphere and the staff are great

name: Aubrey Steidl
text: A nice place. I definitely recommend it, everyone is friendly and the food is great! I recommend trying the pizza. :)

name: Paul Powers
text: I guess it was bad timing attending this location. First impression was disappointing, mainly because I've already been to the Eastchase location, which has tons of fantastic decor. This one has one piece at the front door, and some decent paint in the bathroom hallway. Compared to Eastchase, this location is boring, and bland. It lacks the experience, which is the main reason for eating out (for me). Then it got worse from there, 20 min before we got our drinks, and over an hour before we received food, and it wasn't crazy busy either. Us, and maybe 4 other tables. Like I said, maybe bad timing but my family and I will not be attending this location again. We will just go to Eastchase.

name: Monica Milford
text: Food was great.....service was not good at all. Did not even get plates without asking twice.

name: Anonymous User
text: Prices are a bit high. Took a long time to get food. Cardboard straws

name: Marjorie Connell
text: Everything was great. Service and food.  No complaints

name: HOYT MIDDLETON
text: Great pizza and service

name: Stephanie Akin
text: We have tried this location several times. Last time we ordered to go and the pizzas were not nearly cooked long enough. We threw most of it away. The employees had been sidetracked by a boyfriend that had visited one of the waitresses. It was obviously distracting for them. This time they burnt our pizza so badly they wouldn't serve it to us. There were no less than four employees standing around talking at the ovens for the entire hour we were there. It was the last gluten free pizza crust they had so I had to leave without eating. They still charged me for the kids meal and drink we had ordered and then forgot to bring it to us after we had already paid. My daughter ate cold pizza in the car while I went through a drive thru. We have not had good experiences here.

resp.text: I am very upset to hear about your experience at our restaurant. It certainly is not our standard practice of Customer Service at all! I will make sure that the Management team is aware of your visit and we will most certainly get our staff better trained. I hope that you will give us another chance to show you a great Mellow experience!! Thank you

name: Paul Scott
text: Over priced. Food isn't that good.

name: Dustin Brooks
text: Much larger than any mellow mushroom I've ever been to. The service was good and the food was standard mellow, which is to say delicious. The menu was also larger than ones I've been to in the past.

resp.text: Thank you for the 5 stars! Stay Mellow!!

name: Marilyn Washburn
text: The lunch special and service was great!

name: Sammy Randolph
text: Great food and prices. Had a pizza and bruschetta and steak and chicken calzone between the three of us. Wound up with a lot leftover for the next day. Staff is a little immature but there are air of teens working there.

name: Chris Stitcher
text: Food is great here. Recent service has changed and is not to my looking. Slower refills, less frequent stop bys, and no trivia night. What's up with that?

resp.text: Thank you for your 4-star review. Stay mellow.

name: Peggy Terry
text:
Was a little slow getting our order after seating us . Tea had no ice , and we weren't offered refills .
The pizza was amazing !

name: Carri Robbins
text: I don't know what happened to this place but it use to have great service and great food but my last two visits have been underwhelming.

name: Cathy Dennis

text: Good, but staff did not make the pizza to the same standards as other Mellow Mushroom locations. One glaring error, they put all the ingredients, including the sauce, in the center of the pizza, leaving a 4” crust on a large size; and we we're only one of 3 tables. It wasn't busy. They need more training all the way around.

resp.text: Thank you for your recent review of our Mellow Mushroom. I will certainly make sure that Management staff as well as ALL the kitchen staff is aware of this issue. We do strive to provide an excellent Mellow Mushroom product! Thank you again and we hope to see you soon!

name: Alex Scott
text: We had a medium pepperoni pizza and a plate of cheesy bread. The pizza was absolutely outstanding, and for it being a medium, its much bigger than anticipated. And a better phrase would be if I would like some bread with my cheesy bread, it was smothered which I loved. The atmosphere was extremely relaxed and we were treated like family. By the way, if you go on a Sunday night around 6:30,  ask for David.

name: Janet Baggett
text: As I sit here watching them make pizzas, two individuals have no head cover and the one with head cover just wiped the sweat from his forhead with the back of his gloved hand... Just before he started preparing the dough for another pizza.... I really wish I hadn't seen that! ... Oh my...  Much more to add. I hope the General manager calls me tomorrow.  I left my number...

resp.text: Janet, Hello, I am Ivy McCain the new GM of this location and would love to hear from you. Please feel free to email me at prattville@mellowmushroominfo.com

name: Hayle Storm
text:
This place should be called Meh-llow Mushroom. *long post*
After years of hearing good things, I finally decided to try Mellow Mushroom. We ordered a pizza and their hummus.
- First, the price of the pizza is ridiculous. A large was like $26. Ummm...what? For that price, I expect to be blown away. I wasn't.
- Second, they were understaffed so we had to awkwardly stand there and wait while one guy did at least 4 jobs (poor guy).
- Finally, the food. Very underwhelmed. Very meh.
We got a large meaty meat pizza (or whatever it's called). There was barely any meat on it and the meat that was on it was placed only in the center of the pizza. There was barely any sauce (i'm a sauce person) and the pizza tasted very bland. A frozen pizza would have been so much better. For that price, I could have gotten much more and much better pizza from any of the other pizza places.
The hummus was fine. It came in a plastic container with some veggies. It was only about 2 spoonfuls, but I didn't pay much for it so I didn't expect much.

Overall, just a very underwhelming, disappointing, and meh experience. Definitely would not be going back here.

text: GREAT pizza. My wife and I are regulars to the Prattville Alabama location. Mighty Meaty and Cold Miller Lite!

resp.text: Chip, thank you for your review.  Stay mellow my man!!

text: A step up from Pizza Hut but designed for the masses. Foodies can skip this place. We have been to two locations, Prattville and Montgomery. Okay service moderate prices. Menu to big to execute at a high level. At Prattville we ordered the Buffalo Chicken pizza. The chicken was under represented and the rest was an unidentifiable mass of sauces & cheeses. While edible it was disappointing.

resp.text: Rebakah, I sincerely apologize and have spoken the night crew about their delivery over the phone.Our Kitchen was completely overwhelmed and could no longer accept orders past 7pm last night.  Due to the recent pandemic, we have had to make a lot of changes at our Mellow Mushroom. So, our hours have been shortened to allow for adequate cleaning/ sanitizing while no guests are in the building. Our current hours are 11a-8pm. Again, I apologize and have made sure that we are handling every situation better in these crazy times!

name: criasia
text:
We frequent mellow mushroom almost monthly and love the pizza.  This is a review specifically for the female manager on shift 9 March 2019 at 6:30 pm.  She was very rude and I figured I should share.

I ordered pizza for take out and went to pick it up.  I got to the restaurant about 6:30 and went to the bar area to pick it up.  The lady behind the bar asked my name and immediately told me my pizza wasn't ready yet.  I said that's fine and sat where I could see the take out orders sitting on top of the oven.  I noticed a take out order matching my size boxes sitting there, but figured they weren't mine, as that's what the lady said.  None the less, I happened to notice they weren't going anywhere and began to figure they were mine.  After 20 mins of waiting, the lady went and picked up those very same boxes from on top of the oven and brought them to me.  I mentioned that they had been sitting there since before she told me that my order wasn't ready and that I wasnt pleased with that.

She began to tell me I was a liar and that it was impossible.  That I had confused those boxes with other take out.  She then told me to feel how hot the pizzas were and I mentioned that they were warm because they had been sitting on top of the oven for the last 20 minutes.  It was quite a weird feeling to be told i was crazy and listen to several complete lies about my pizza that i had been watching for the last 20 mins.  long story short, it was a super uncomfortable situation and the lying manager should probably be disciplined.

I will continue to frequent mellow mushroom, cause the pizza is delicous.

name: Kristal Price
text: If they would let me rate a zero i would. I went to eat their with my family tonight and this is what happened. 1. Waitress took our order. She brung our drinks pretty fast. 10 minutes later she brung us plates and napkins and no silverware. 2. We ordered our food and it took us at least an hour before we got our appetizer. Then another 15 minutes for me to get a salad. Now the waitress did not bring me my salad the hostess did. Who also was very nice to bring me silverware. Ok then my son got his little cheese pizza and apples. That meal was perfect. My salad wasnt even great. I had the wrong lettuce. Ok 30 minutes later my daughter gets her pretzel dippers and they were almost as big as her and hard as all get out. You could have broken a glass with it. Ok about another 30-35 minutes past and my husband still has not gotten his calzone. It finally arrives and its cold. The waitress has not even checked on us since we got our drinks. The hostess again was nice enough to bring him silverware after we tried to get the attention of our server for about 10 minutes. They said they would take off my daughters meal bc it was an aweful meal and she didnt even get her apple slices then they still charge us for it. It was the worst meal i have ever eaten there.

resp.text: Thank you for letting us know where we have fallen short.  We will do better moving forward.  Stay mellow.

name: Michael Earls (cerkit)
text:
We toggle between dining in and takeout. We eat a LOT of this pizza. We recently ordered a pizza with "everything" on it (except tomatos and pepperoni) and it was delicious. I was full after a single piece.

When we dine in, I usually order the avocado hoagie without onions. It's AWESOME. If not the hoagie, we sometimes share a calzone with ham and pineapple. It's enough food for the two of us.

Like I said, we eat here often. This restaurant is just as good as any of the locations in Georgia that we've been to. Somehow, we always get lucky enough to live in locations with a Mellow Mushroom nearby. Thank goodness Prattville was no different.

Something about the wheat dough with cornmeal just doesn't allow it to rise like a yeast dough calzone. Stick with the pizzas, imo. Great service experience though, both the server and especially the manager were great.

name: Michael Earls (cerkit)
text:
We toggle between dining in and takeout. We eat a LOT of this pizza. We recently ordered a pizza with "everything" on it (except tomatos and pepperoni) and it was delicious. I was full after a single piece.

When we dine in, I usually order the avocado hoagie without onions. It's AWESOME. If not the hoagie, we sometimes share a calzone with ham and pineapple. It's enough food for the two of us.

Like I said, we eat here often. This restaurant is just as good as any of the locations in Georgia that we've been to. Somehow, we always get lucky enough to live in locations with a Mellow Mushroom nearby. Thank goodness Prattville was no different.

name: Katie Jo Gossett
text: I am beyond disappointed, I put my order in online for delivery at 6:30pm. My 3 small children patiently waited at the door for the pizza man. I checked the tracker an hour later and was shocked to find they had cancelled my order. I had no idea. Not even a courtesy call to state that it had been cancelled. I'm certain it is because of the neighborhood, which I considered after the fact. I'm okay with them not delivering here, in fact I would have gladly given my $15 tip to the person who prepared my order had they just called and said.... We don't deliver there but we would be happy to prepare your order for pickup ( my husband was already out picking up my chinese, which will be cold by the time I eat because I refuse to eat without my children.) I might live in a budget friendly not so appealing possibly dangerous neighborhood but I'm a good customer, I tip well and I appreciate the courtesy of the places I give my money.

text: The new store general manager Everett was very professional with my order. I placed an order to be delivered and it was cancelled due to at that moment they was only doing carryouts. Everett called to let me know the situation. I'm very glad he handled the situation the way he did because in the past when I placed a delivery it would get cancelled without me knowing and I would just be waiting and than check back to see that it was cancelled so at times I would reorder thinking its my card but itll cancel again. than I would call the store but no one would answer even though it wasnt store closing hours. When I reordered later for a carry out, he threw in an extra surprise for my inconvenience😉😉 So kudos to Everett for the professionalism!!

name: Chris F. - iamd4g
text: Even their reply is fake and auto-generated like their b🤬🤬🤬t pizza and service. There will be no "next time" BOTTOM DOLLAR ON THAT. Horrible experiences at this locations but tonight's interaction burns bridges. Granted, there was inclement weather tonight so some delay and difficulties were expected. However, from what I experienced tonight, Domino's Pizza off of Mobile Hwy would have been better closed. No matter, I ordered from the app and request delivery. I finalized the order on the app but I later received a call from the store, saying they didn't have delivery drivers (again, expected difficulties) and I need to pick up my food. What they didn't tell me is that they voided my app order, placing a hold on my debit card (upcoming 'last straw'), and I would need to bring my debit card to re-order. So, when I arrived at the store, lo and behold. They told me that I needed my card. Thus, I had to drive back through Tropical Storm Sally in a partially wrecked car, just to get my debit card. (Now, given my past dealings with this store, I should have know better but I am a naive person person at times.) I get back to the store, just to find out that because of the order I made on the app, Domino's Pizza tried to charge me twice for the same order. One for delivery and the other for carryout. I snapped. So what? I need to have at least 40 dollars in my bank account to order pizza. I am sorry; your tax dollars don't pay teachers enough for that. I find it really funny that Domino's Pizza can jump into your bank account so fast when you order but, refunding and correcting orders, they feint as bumbling idiots. I do not just hold the store at fault but the entire corporation. They have no regard for customer service; Domino's Pizza only cares about profits and their shareholders. I wouldn't drop or invest a dime into Domino's Pizza, with all the dried and burnt pizzas I have ordered over the years. Hell, Pizza Hut has a hotline for situations like this, but you invest your time in 'Pizza Insurance' and 'HotSpots'. How about fairly selling pizza when trying to double dip into people's bank accounts? How about optimizing your systems so errors like this can fixed quicker? Just go under, already. But, before you do, give me my money back because YOU STILL HAVE NOT DONE THAT YET FOR A ORDER I CAN NOT EAT BECAUSE I NEVER RECEIVED IT!

resp.text: Hello Chris, I apologize for your experience and would like to assure you that this is not an automated response and your review is individually read and responded to because we want to make sure your concerns are addressed. We value your feedback and hope to talk with you in hopes of getting to the bottom of this. Please send your contact information to us at Dominos5885@5-StarPizza.com so that we may reach out to you directly. Our team appreciates your valued feedback and we hope you have a wonderful day.

name: Michael Murphy
text: Here we go again. Stopped using Domino's a couple of years ago because of their poor customer service. Figured that they had two years to fix it, I'd give them a try. Put my order in for delivery at about 12:30 and their tracker said the pizza was out of the oven at 12:42.  It is about 8 minutes from the store to my office. 1:00 pm, no pizza, 1:10 pm no pizza, 1:25 pm, still no pizza. Called the store. Only have one driver but it'll be out shortly. (Maybe Domino's should consider giving their drivers a living wage so they would stay).1:40 pm, pizza finally shows up at my office. The driver gave me my now cold pizza and seemed a bit miffed that I failed to leave a tip.  Guess I'll wait two more years. EDIT: 5-23-2019 Just got off the phone with a woman who identified herself as the "manager on duty"  per the response from the "owner" I called the number listed and explained that I  was asked to call regarding my order (#19 placed 5-3-19)  but twas told there is no record of it.  Yep, great customer service.

text: My boyfriend and I ordered a pizza from this location tonight and ONCE AGAIN!!!! HORRIBLE SERVICE!!! I recorded both calls that I made for corporate office to hear. There is no reason this franchise should be wearing their name. As usual I ordered online and waited 30minutes for my delivery. Although the pizza tracker showed it at quality check phase (the last phase before delivery), I get a dead air call no one said anything. So I called back and get an answer from a rude Adrian screaming and cutting me off because I questioned him about waiting 30minutes to call me to tell me they don't deliver in my area after dark. In which I just received a delivery from them about a week or 2 at this hour ago so I guess it's a new policy, So why was I able to place an order and why was I charged and again 30MINUTES before you call knowing you have an online tracker indicating the steps of my delivery??????? Don't waste your time dealing with these people. It's a hit or miss on the quality of your service or if you'll get your food at all. BUT YOU WILL BE CHARGED!!!!!!This is the last my friends or family will be using them now I have to wait 2-3 business days to get my money back. This is pathetic . BEWARE!!!!!!! SHITTY SERVICE!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
